5479 //*-*- I/O unit numbers
5480  fIsysrd = i1;
5481  fIsyswr = i2;
5482  fIstkwr[0] = fIsyswr;
5483  fNstkwr = 1;
5484  fIsyssa = i3;
5485  fNstkrd = 0;
5486 //*-*- version identifier
5487  fCvrsn = "95.03++ ";
5488 //*-*- some CONSTANT
5489  fMaxint = fMaxpar;
5490  fMaxext = 2*fMaxpar;
5491  fUndefi = -54321;
5492  fBigedm = 123456;
5493  fCundef = ")UNDEFINED";
5494  fCovmes[0] = "NO ERROR MATRIX \n";
5495  fCovmes[1] = "ERR MATRIX APPROXIMATE\n";
5496  fCovmes[2] = "ERR MATRIX NOT POS-DEF\n";
5497  fCovmes[3] = "ERROR MATRIX ACCURATE \n";
5498 //*-*- some starting values
5499  fNblock = 0;
5500  fIcomnd = 0;
5501  fCtitl = fCundef;
5502  fCfrom = "INPUT ";
5503  fNfcn = 0;
5504  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
5505  fCstatu = "INITIALIZE";
5506  fISW[2] = 0;
5507  fISW[3] = 0;
5508  fISW[4] = 1;
5509 //*-*- fISW[5]=0 for batch jobs, =1 for interactive jobs
5510 //*-*- =-1 for originally interactive temporarily batch
5511 
5512  fISW[5] = 0;
5513 
5514 // if (intrac(&dummy)) fISW[5] = 1;
5515 //*-*- DEBUG options set to default values
5516  for(idb = 0; idb <= 10; ++idb) {
5517  fIdbg[idb] = 0;
5518  }
5519 
5520  fLrepor = false;
5521  fLwarn = true;
5522  fLimset = false;
5523  fLnewmn = false;
5524  fIstrat = 1;
5525  fItaur = 0;
5526 //*-*- default page dimensions and 'new page' carriage control integer
5527  fNpagwd = 120;
5528  fNpagln = 56;
5529  fNewpag = 1;
5530 
5531  if(fISW[5] > 0) {
5532  fNpagwd = 80;
5533  fNpagln = 30;
5534  fNewpag = 0;
5535  }
5536 
5537  fUp = 1;
5538  fUpdflt = fUp;
5539 //*-*- determine machine accuracy epsmac
5540  epstry = .5;
5541 
5542  for(i = 1; i <= 100; ++i) {
5543  epstry *= .5;
5544  epsp1 = epstry + 1;
5545  mntiny(epsp1, epsbak);
5546 
5547  if(epsbak < epstry)
5548  goto L35;
5549  }
5550 
5551  epstry = 1e-7;
5552  fEpsmac = epstry*4;
5553  printf(" MNINIT UNABLE TO DETERMINE ARITHMETIC PRECISION. WILL ASSUME:%g\n", fEpsmac);
5554 L35:
5555  fEpsmac = epstry*8;
5556  fEpsma2 = sqrt(fEpsmac)*2;
5557 //*-*- the vlims are a non-negligible distance from pi/2
5558 //*-*- used by MNPINT to set variables "near" the physical limits
5559  piby2 = atan(1)*2;
5560  distnn = sqrt(fEpsma2)*8;
5561  fVlimhi = piby2 - distnn;
5562  fVlimlo = -piby2 + distnn;
5563  mncler();
5564 // printf(" MINUIT RELEASE %s INITIALIZED. DIMENSIONS 100/50 EPSMAC=%g\n",fCvrsn.c_str(),fEpsmac);
5565 } /* mninit_ */
5566 
5567 //______________________________________________________________________________
5568 void TMinuit::mnlims() {
5569 //*-*-*-*Interprets the SET LIM command, to reset the parameter limits*-*-*-*
5570 //*-* =============================================================
5571 //*-* Called from MNSET
5572 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
5573 
5574  /* Local variables */
5575  double dxdi, snew;
5576  int kint, i2, newcod, ifx=0, inu;
5577 
5578  fCfrom = "SET LIM ";
5579  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
5580  fCstatu = "NO CHANGE ";
5581  i2 = int(fWord7[0]);
5582 
5583  if(i2 > fMaxext || i2 < 0)
5584  goto L900;
5585 
5586  if(i2 > 0)
5587  goto L30;
5588 
5589 //*-*- set limits on all parameters
5590  newcod = 4;
5591 
5592  if(fWord7[1] == fWord7[2])
5593  newcod = 1;
5594 
5595  for(inu = 1; inu <= fNu; ++inu) {
5596  if(fNvarl[inu-1] <= 0)
5597  continue;
5598 
5599  if(fNvarl[inu-1] == 1 && newcod == 1)
5600  continue;
5601 
5602  kint = fNiofex[inu-1];
5603 
5604 //*-*- see if parameter has been fixed
5605  if(kint <= 0) {
5606  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
5607  printf(" LIMITS NOT CHANGED FOR FIXED PARAMETER:%4d\n", inu);
5608  }
5609 
5610  continue;
5611  }
5612 
5613  if(newcod == 1) {
5614 //*-*- remove limits from parameter
5615  if(fISW[4] > 0) {
5616  printf(" LIMITS REMOVED FROM PARAMETER :%3d\n", inu);
5617  }
5618 
5619  fCstatu = "NEW LIMITS";
5620  mndxdi(fX[kint-1], kint-1, dxdi);
5621  snew = fGstep[kint-1]*dxdi;
5622  fGstep[kint-1] = fabs(snew);
5623  fNvarl[inu-1] = 1;
5624  } else {
5625 //*-*- put limits on parameter
5626  fAlim[inu-1] = min(fWord7[1], fWord7[2]);
5627  fBlim[inu-1] = max(fWord7[1], fWord7[2]);
5628 
5629  if(fISW[4] > 0) {
5630  printf(" PARAMETER %3d LIMITS SET TO %15.5g%15.5g\n", inu, fAlim[inu-1], fBlim[inu-1]);
5631  }
5632 
5633  fNvarl[inu-1] = 4;
5634  fCstatu = "NEW LIMITS";
5635  fGstep[kint-1] = -.1;
5636  }
5637  }
5638 
5639  goto L900;
5640 //*-*- set limits on one parameter
5641 L30:
5642 
5643  if(fNvarl[i2-1] <= 0) {
5644  printf(" PARAMETER %3d IS NOT VARIABLE.\n", i2);
5645  goto L900;
5646  }
5647 
5648  kint = fNiofex[i2-1];
5649 
5650 //*-*- see if parameter was fixed
5651  if(kint == 0) {
5652  printf(" REQUEST TO CHANGE LIMITS ON FIXED PARAMETER:%3d\n", i2);
5653 
5654  for(ifx = 1; ifx <= fNpfix; ++ifx) {
5655  if(i2 == fIpfix[ifx-1])
5656  goto L92;
5657  }
5658 
5659  printf(" MINUIT BUG IN MNLIMS. SEE F. JAMES\n");
5660 L92:
5661  ;
5662  }
5663 
5664  if(fWord7[1] != fWord7[2])
5665  goto L235;
5666 
5667 //*-*- remove limits
5668  if(fNvarl[i2-1] != 1) {
5669  if(fISW[4] > 0) {
5670  printf(" LIMITS REMOVED FROM PARAMETER %2d\n", i2);
5671  }
5672 
5673  fCstatu = "NEW LIMITS";
5674 
5675  if(kint <= 0) {
5676  fGsteps[ifx-1] = fabs(fGsteps[ifx-1]);
5677  } else {
5678  mndxdi(fX[kint-1], kint-1, dxdi);
5679 
5680  if(fabs(dxdi) < .01)
5681  dxdi = .01;
5682 
5683  fGstep[kint-1] = fabs(fGstep[kint-1]*dxdi);
5684  fGrd[kint-1] *= dxdi;
5685  }
5686 
5687  fNvarl[i2-1] = 1;
5688  } else {
5689  printf(" NO LIMITS SPECIFIED. PARAMETER %3d IS ALREADY UNLIMITED. NO CHANGE.\n", i2);
5690  }
5691 
5692  goto L900;
5693 //*-*- put on limits
5694 L235:
5695  fAlim[i2-1] = min(fWord7[1], fWord7[2]);
5696  fBlim[i2-1] = max(fWord7[1], fWord7[2]);
5697  fNvarl[i2-1] = 4;
5698 
5699  if(fISW[4] > 0) {
5700  printf(" PARAMETER %3d LIMITS SET TO %15.5g%15.5g\n", i2, fAlim[i2-1], fBlim[i2-1]);
5701  }
5702 
5703  fCstatu = "NEW LIMITS";
5704 
5705  if(kint <= 0)
5706  fGsteps[ifx-1] = -.1;
5707  else
5708  fGstep[kint-1] = -.1;
5709 
5710 L900:
5711 
5712  if(fCstatu != "NO CHANGE ") {
5713  mnexin(fX);
5714  mnrset(1);
5715  }
5716 } /* mnlims_ */
5717 
5718 //______________________________________________________________________________
5719 void TMinuit::mnline(double* start, double fstart, double* step, double slope, double toler) {
5720 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Perform a line search from position START*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
5721 //*-* =========================================
5722 //*-* along direction STEP, where the length of vector STEP
5723 //*-* gives the expected position of minimum.
5724 //*-* FSTART is value of function at START
5725 //*-* SLOPE (if non-zero) is df/dx along STEP at START
5726 //*-* TOLER is initial tolerance of minimum in direction STEP
5727 //*-*
5728 //*-* SLAMBG and ALPHA control the maximum individual steps allowed.
5729 //*-* The first step is always =1. The max length of second step is SLAMBG.
5730 //*-* The max size of subsequent steps is the maximum previous successful
5731 //*-* step multiplied by ALPHA + the size of most recent successful step,
5732 //*-* but cannot be smaller than SLAMBG.
5733 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
5734 
5735  /* Local variables */
5736  double xpq[12], ypq[12], slam, sdev, coeff[3], denom, flast;
5737  double fvals[3], xvals[3], f1, fvmin, xvmin, ratio, f2, f3, fvmax;
5738  double toler8, toler9, overal, undral, slamin, slamax, slopem;
5739  int i, nparx=0, nvmax=0, nxypt, kk, ipt;
5740  bool ldebug;
5741  string cmess;
5742  char chpq[13];
5743  int l65, l70, l80;
5744 
5745  /* Function Body */
5746  l65 = 0;
5747  l70 = 0;
5748  l80 = 0;
5749  ldebug = fIdbg[1] >= 1;
5750 //*-*- starting values for overall limits on total step SLAM
5751  overal = 1e3;
5752  undral = -100;
5753 
5754 //*-*- debug check if start is ok
5755  if(ldebug) {
5756  mninex(&start[0]);
5757  Eval(nparx, fGin, f1, fU, 4);
5758  ++fNfcn;
5759 
5760  if(f1 != fstart) {
5761  printf(" MNLINE start point not consistent, F values, parameters=\n");
5762 
5763  for(kk = 1; kk <= fNpar; ++kk) {
5764  printf(" %14.5e\n", fX[kk-1]);
5765  }
5766  }
5767  }
5768 
5769 //*-*- . set up linear search along STEP
5770  fvmin = fstart;
5771  xvmin = 0;
5772  nxypt = 1;
5773  chpq[0] = charal[0];
5774  xpq[0] = 0;
5775  ypq[0] = fstart;
5776 //*-*- SLAMIN = smallest possible value of ABS(SLAM)
5777  slamin = 0;
5778 
5779  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
5780  if(step[i-1] != 0) {
5781  ratio = fabs(start[i-1] / step[i-1]);
5782 
5783  if(slamin == 0)
5784  slamin = ratio;
5785 
5786  if(ratio < slamin)
5787  slamin = ratio;
5788  }
5789 
5790  fX[i-1] = start[i-1] + step[i-1];
5791  }
5792 
5793  if(slamin == 0)
5794  slamin = fEpsmac;
5795 
5796  slamin *= fEpsma2;
5797  nparx = fNpar;
5798 
5799  mninex(fX);
5800  Eval(nparx, fGin, f1, fU, 4);
5801  ++fNfcn;
5802  ++nxypt;
5803  chpq[nxypt-1] = charal[nxypt-1];
5804  xpq[nxypt-1] = 1;
5805  ypq[nxypt-1] = f1;
5806 
5807  if(f1 < fstart) {
5808  fvmin = f1;
5809  xvmin = 1;
5810  }
5811 
5812 //*-*- . quadr interp using slope GDEL and two points
5813  slam = 1;
5814  toler8 = toler;
5815  slamax = 5;
5816  flast = f1;
5817 //*-*- can iterate on two-points (cut) if no imprvmnt
5818 
5819  do {
5820  denom = (flast - fstart - slope*slam)*2 / (slam*slam);
5821  slam = 1;
5822 
5823  if(denom != 0)
5824  slam = -slope / denom;
5825 
5826  if(slam < 0)
5827  slam = slamax;
5828 
5829  if(slam > slamax)
5830  slam = slamax;
5831 
5832  if(slam < toler8)
5833  slam = toler8;
5834 
5835  if(slam < slamin) {
5836  l80 = 1;
5837  break;
5838  }
5839 
5840  if(fabs(slam - 1) < toler8 && f1 < fstart) {
5841  l70 = 1;
5842  break;
5843  }
5844 
5845  if(fabs(slam - 1) < toler8)
5846  slam = toler8 + 1;
5847 
5848  if(nxypt >= 12) {
5849  l65 = 1;
5850  break;
5851  }
5852 
5853  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
5854  fX[i-1] = start[i-1] + slam*step[i-1];
5855  }
5856 
5857  mninex(fX);
5858  nparx = fNpar;
5859  Eval(nparx, fGin, f2, fU, 4);
5860  ++fNfcn;
5861  ++nxypt;
5862  chpq[nxypt-1] = charal[nxypt-1];
5863  xpq[nxypt-1] = slam;
5864  ypq[nxypt-1] = f2;
5865 
5866  if(f2 < fvmin) {
5867  fvmin = f2;
5868  xvmin = slam;
5869  }
5870 
5871  if(fstart == fvmin) {
5872  flast = f2;
5873  toler8 = toler*slam;
5874  overal = slam - toler8;
5875  slamax = overal;
5876  }
5877  } while(fstart == fvmin);
5878 
5879  if(!l65 && !l70 && !l80) {
5880 //*-*- . quadr interp using 3 points
5881  xvals[0] = xpq[0];
5882  fvals[0] = ypq[0];
5883  xvals[1] = xpq[nxypt-2];
5884  fvals[1] = ypq[nxypt-2];
5885  xvals[2] = xpq[nxypt-1];
5886  fvals[2] = ypq[nxypt-1];
5887 
5888 //*-*- begin iteration, calculate desired step
5889  do {
5890  slamax = max(slamax, fabs(xvmin)*2);
5891  mnpfit(xvals, fvals, 3, coeff, sdev);
5892 
5893  if(coeff[2] <= 0) {
5894  slopem = coeff[2]*2*xvmin + coeff[1];
5895 
5896  if(slopem <= 0)
5897  slam = xvmin + slamax;
5898  else
5899  slam = xvmin - slamax;
5900  } else {
5901  slam = -coeff[1] / (coeff[2]*2);
5902 
5903  if(slam > xvmin + slamax)
5904  slam = xvmin + slamax;
5905 
5906  if(slam < xvmin - slamax)
5907  slam = xvmin - slamax;
5908  }
5909 
5910  if(slam > 0) {
5911  if(slam > overal)
5912  slam = overal;
5913  else if(slam < undral)
5914  slam = undral;
5915  }
5916 
5917 //*-*- come here if step was cut below
5918  do {
5919  toler9 = max(toler8, fabs(toler8*slam));
5920 
5921  for(ipt = 1; ipt <= 3; ++ipt) {
5922  if(fabs(slam - xvals[ipt-1]) < toler9) {
5923  l70 = 1;
5924  break;
5925  }
5926  }
5927 
5928  if(l70)
5929  break;
5930 
5931 //*-*- take the step
5932  if(nxypt >= 12) {
5933  l65 = 1;
5934  break;
5935  }
5936 
5937  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
5938  fX[i-1] = start[i-1] + slam*step[i-1];
5939  }
5940 
5941  mninex(fX);
5942  Eval(nparx, fGin, f3, fU, 4);
5943  ++fNfcn;
5944  ++nxypt;
5945  chpq[nxypt-1] = charal[nxypt-1];
5946  xpq[nxypt-1] = slam;
5947  ypq[nxypt-1] = f3;
5948 //*-*- find worst previous point out of three
5949  fvmax = fvals[0];
5950  nvmax = 1;
5951 
5952  if(fvals[1] > fvmax) {
5953  fvmax = fvals[1];
5954  nvmax = 2;
5955  }
5956 
5957  if(fvals[2] > fvmax) {
5958  fvmax = fvals[2];
5959  nvmax = 3;
5960  }
5961 
5962 //*-*- if latest point worse than all three previous, cut step
5963  if(f3 >= fvmax) {
5964  if(nxypt >= 12) {
5965  l65 = 1;
5966  break;
5967  }
5968 
5969  if(slam > xvmin)
5970  overal = min(overal, slam - toler8);
5971 
5972  if(slam < xvmin)
5973  undral = max(undral, slam + toler8);
5974 
5975  slam = (slam + xvmin)*.5;
5976  }
5977  } while(f3 >= fvmax);
5978 
5979 //*-*- prepare another iteration, replace worst previous point
5980  if(l65 || l70)
5981  break;
5982 
5983  xvals[nvmax-1] = slam;
5984  fvals[nvmax-1] = f3;
5985 
5986  if(f3 < fvmin) {
5987  fvmin = f3;
5988  xvmin = slam;
5989  } else {
5990  if(slam > xvmin)
5991  overal = min(overal, slam - toler8);
5992 
5993  if(slam < xvmin)
5994  undral = max(undral, slam + toler8);
5995  }
5996  } while(nxypt < 12);
5997  }
5998 
5999 //*-*- . . end of iteration . . .
6000 //*-*- stop because too many iterations
6001  if(!l70 && !l80) {
6002  cmess = " LINE SEARCH HAS EXHAUSTED THE LIMIT OF FUNCTION CALLS ";
6003 
6004  if(ldebug) {
6005  printf(" MNLINE DEBUG: steps=\n");
6006 
6007  for(kk = 1; kk <= fNpar; ++kk) {
6008  printf(" %12.4g\n", step[kk-1]);
6009  }
6010  }
6011  }
6012 
6013 //*-*- stop because within tolerance
6014  if(l70)
6015  cmess = " LINE SEARCH HAS ATTAINED TOLERANCE ";
6016 
6017  if(l80)
6018  cmess = " STEP SIZE AT ARITHMETICALLY ALLOWED MINIMUM";
6019 
6020  fAmin = fvmin;
6021 
6022  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6023  fDirin[i-1] = step[i-1]*xvmin;
6024  fX[i-1] = start[i-1] + fDirin[i-1];
6025  }
6026 
6027  mninex(fX);
6028 
6029  if(xvmin < 0) {
6030  mnwarn("D", "MNLINE", " LINE MINIMUM IN BACKWARDS DIRECTION");
6031  }
6032 
6033  if(fvmin == fstart) {
6034  mnwarn("D", "MNLINE", " LINE SEARCH FINDS NO IMPROVEMENT ");
6035  }
6036 
6037  if(ldebug) {
6038  printf(" AFTER %3d POINTS,%s\n", nxypt, cmess.c_str());
6039  mnplot(xpq, ypq, chpq, nxypt, fNpagwd, fNpagln);
6040  }
6041 } /* mnline_ */
6042 
6043 //______________________________________________________________________________
6044 void TMinuit::mnmatu(int kode) {
6045 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Prints the covariance matrix v when KODE=1*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6046 //*-* ==========================================
6047 //*-* always prints the global correlations, and
6048 //*-* calculates and prints the individual correlation coefficients
6049 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6050 
6051  /* Local variables */
6052  int ndex, i, j, m, n, ncoef, nparm, id, it, ix;
6053  int nsofar, ndi, ndj, iso, isw2, isw5;
6054  string ctemp;
6055 
6056  isw2 = fISW[1];
6057 
6058  if(isw2 < 1) {
6059  printf("%s\n", fCovmes[isw2].c_str());
6060  return;
6061  }
6062 
6063  if(fNpar == 0) {
6064  printf(" MNMATU: NPAR=0\n");
6065  return;
6066  }
6067 
6068 //*-*- . . . . .external error matrix
6069  if(kode == 1) {
6070  isw5 = fISW[4];
6071  fISW[4] = 2;
6072  mnemat(fP, fMaxint);
6073 
6074  if(isw2 < 3) {
6075  printf("%s\n", fCovmes[isw2].c_str());
6076  }
6077 
6078  fISW[4] = isw5;
6079  }
6080 
6081 //*-*- . . . . . correlation coeffs. .
6082  if(fNpar <= 1)
6083  return;
6084 
6085  mnwerr();
6086 //*-*- NCOEF is number of coeff. that fit on one line, not to exceed 20
6087  ncoef = (fNpagwd - 19) / 6;
6088  ncoef = min(ncoef, 20);
6089  nparm = min(fNpar, ncoef);
6090  printf(" PARAMETER CORRELATION COEFFICIENTS \n");
6091  ctemp = " NO. GLOBAL";
6092 
6093  for(id = 1; id <= nparm; ++id) {
6094  ctemp += local_Form(" %6d", fNexofi[id-1]).c_str();
6095  }
6096 
6097  printf("%s\n", ctemp.c_str());
6098 
6099  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6100  ix = fNexofi[i-1];
6101  ndi = i*(i + 1) / 2;
6102 
6103  for(j = 1; j <= fNpar; ++j) {
6104  m = max(i, j);
6105  n = min(i, j);
6106  ndex = m*(m-1) / 2 + n;
6107  ndj = j*(j + 1) / 2;
6108  fMATUvline[j-1] = fVhmat[ndex-1] / sqrt(fabs(fVhmat[ndi-1]*fVhmat[ndj-1]));
6109  }
6110 
6111  nparm = min(fNpar, ncoef);
6112  ctemp = local_Form(" %3d %7.5f ", ix, fGlobcc[i-1]).c_str();
6113 
6114  for(it = 1; it <= nparm; ++it) {
6115  ctemp += local_Form(" %6.3f", fMATUvline[it-1]).c_str();
6116  }
6117 
6118  printf("%s\n", ctemp.c_str());
6119 
6120  if(i <= nparm)
6121  continue;
6122 
6123  ctemp = " ";
6124 
6125  for(iso = 1; iso <= 10; ++iso) {
6126  nsofar = nparm;
6127  nparm = min(fNpar, nsofar + ncoef);
6128 
6129  for(it = nsofar + 1; it <= nparm; ++it) {
6130  ctemp = ctemp + local_Form(" %6.3f", fMATUvline[it-1]).c_str();
6131  }
6132 
6133  printf("%s\n", ctemp.c_str());
6134 
6135  if(i <= nparm)
6136  break;
6137  }
6138  }
6139 
6140  if(isw2 < 3) {
6141  printf(" %s\n", fCovmes[isw2].c_str());
6142  }
6143 } /* mnmatu_ */
6144 
6145 //#include <iostream> // Rolf addition
6146 
6147 //______________________________________________________________________________
6148 void TMinuit::mnmigr() {
6149 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Performs a local function minimization*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6150 //*-* ======================================
6151 //*-* Performs a local function minimization using basically the
6152 //*-* method of Davidon-Fletcher-Powell as modified by Fletcher
6153 //*-* ref. -- Fletcher, Comp.J. 13,317 (1970) "switching method"
6154 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6155 
6156  /* Local variables */
6157  double gdel, gami, vlen, dsum, gssq, vsum, d;
6158  double fzero, fs, ri, delgam, rhotol;
6159  double gdgssq, gvg, vgi;
6160  int npfn, ndex, iext, i, j, m, n, npsdf, nparx;
6161  int iswtr, lined2, kk, nfcnmg, nrstrt, iter;
6162  bool ldebug;
6163  double toler = 0.05;
6164 
6165  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Entering mnmigr.\n";
6166 
6167  if(fNpar <= 0)
6168  return;
6169 
6170  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
6171  mnamin();
6172 
6173  ldebug = false;
6174 
6175  if(fIdbg[4] >= 1)
6176  ldebug = true;
6177 
6178  fCfrom = "MIGRAD ";
6179  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
6180  nfcnmg = fNfcn;
6181  fCstatu = "INITIATE ";
6182  iswtr = fISW[4] - 2*fItaur;
6183  npfn = fNfcn;
6184  nparx = fNpar;
6185  vlen = (double)(fNpar*(fNpar + 1) / 2);
6186  nrstrt = 0;
6187  npsdf = 0;
6188  lined2 = 0;
6189  fISW[3] = -1;
6190  rhotol = fApsi*.001;
6191 
6192  if(iswtr >= 1) {
6193  printf(" START MIGRAD MINIMIZATION. STRATEGY %2d. CONVERGENCE WHEN EDM .LT.%9.2e\n", fIstrat, rhotol);
6194  }
6195 
6196 //*-*- initialization strategy
6197  if(fIstrat < 2 || fISW[1] >= 3)
6198  goto L2;
6199 
6200 //*-*- come (back) here to restart completely
6201 L1:
6202 
6203  if(nrstrt > fIstrat) {
6204  fCstatu = "FAILED ";
6205  fISW[3] = -1;
6206  goto L230;
6207  }
6208 
6209 //*-*- . get full covariance and gradient
6210  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling mnhess (5135).\n";
6211  mnhess();
6212  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling mnwerr (5137).\n";
6213  mnwerr();
6214  npsdf = 0;
6215 
6216  if(fISW[1] >= 1)
6217  goto L10;
6218 
6219 //*-*- . get gradient at start point
6220 L2:
6221  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling mninex (5143).\n";
6222  mninex(fX);
6223 
6224  if(fISW[2] == 1) {
6225  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling Eval (5146).\n";
6226  Eval(nparx, fGin, fzero, fU, 2);
6227  ++fNfcn;
6228  }
6229 
6230  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling mnderi (5149).\n";
6231  mnderi();
6232 
6233  if(fISW[1] >= 1)
6234  goto L10;
6235 
6236 //*-*- sometimes start with diagonal matrix
6237  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6238  fMIGRxxs[i-1] = fX[i-1];
6239  fMIGRstep[i-1] = 0;
6240  }
6241 
6242 //*-*- do line search if second derivative negative
6243  ++lined2;
6244 
6245  if(lined2 < (fIstrat + 1)*fNpar) {
6246  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6247  if(fG2[i-1] > 0)
6248  continue;
6249 
6250  if(fGrd[i-1] > 0)
6251  fMIGRstep[i-1] = -fabs(fGstep[i-1]);
6252  else
6253  fMIGRstep[i-1] = fabs(fGstep[i-1]);
6254 
6255  gdel = fMIGRstep[i-1]*fGrd[i-1];
6256  fs = fAmin;
6257  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Calling mnline (5166).\n";
6258  mnline(fMIGRxxs, fs, fMIGRstep, gdel, toler);
6259  mnwarn("D", "MNMIGR", "Negative G2 line search");
6260  iext = fNexofi[i-1];
6261 
6262  if(ldebug) {
6263  printf(" Negative G2 line search, param %3d %13.3g%13.3g\n", iext, fs, fAmin);
6264  }
6265 
6266  goto L2;
6267  }
6268  }
6269 
6270 //*-*- make diagonal error matrix
6271  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6272  ndex = i*(i-1) / 2;
6273 
6274  for(j = 1; j <= i-1; ++j) {
6275  ++ndex;
6276  fVhmat[ndex-1] = 0;
6277  }
6278 
6279  ++ndex;
6280 
6281  if(fG2[i-1] <= 0)
6282  fG2[i-1] = 1;
6283 
6284  fVhmat[ndex-1] = 2 / fG2[i-1];
6285  }
6286 
6287  fDcovar = 1;
6288 
6289  if(ldebug) {
6290  printf(" DEBUG MNMIGR, STARTING MATRIX DIAGONAL, VHMAT=\n");
6291 
6292  for(kk = 1; kk <= int(vlen); ++kk) {
6293  printf(" %10.2g\n", fVhmat[kk-1]);
6294  }
6295  }
6296 
6297 //*-*- ready to start first iteration
6298 L10:
6299  //std::cout << "Rolf addition: Starting L10 (5196).\n";
6300  ++nrstrt;
6301 
6302  if(nrstrt > fIstrat + 1) {
6303  fCstatu = "FAILED ";
6304  goto L230;
6305  }
6306 
6307  fs = fAmin;
6308 //*-*- . . . get EDM and set up loop
6309  fEDM = 0;
6310 
6311  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6312  fMIGRgs[i-1] = fGrd[i-1];
6313  fMIGRxxs[i-1] = fX[i-1];
6314  ndex = i*(i-1) / 2;
6315 
6316  for(j = 1; j <= i-1; ++j) {
6317  ++ndex;
6318  fEDM += fMIGRgs[i-1]*fVhmat[ndex-1]*fMIGRgs[j-1];
6319  }
6320 
6321  ++ndex;
6322  fEDM += fMIGRgs[i-1]*fMIGRgs[i-1]*.5*fVhmat[ndex-1];
6323  }
6324 
6325  fEDM = fEDM*.5*(fDcovar*3 + 1);
6326 
6327  if(fEDM < 0) {
6328  mnwarn("W", "MIGRAD", "STARTING MATRIX NOT POS-DEFINITE.");
6329  fISW[1] = 0;
6330  fDcovar = 1;
6331  goto L2;
6332  }
6333 
6334  if(fISW[1] == 0)
6335  fEDM = fBigedm;
6336 
6337  iter = 0;
6338  mninex(fX);
6339  mnwerr();
6340 
6341  if(iswtr >= 1)
6342  mnprin(3, fAmin);
6343 
6344  if(iswtr >= 2)
6345  mnmatu(0);
6346 
6347 //*-*- . . . . . start main loop
6348 L24:
6349 
6350  if(fNfcn - npfn >= fNfcnmx)
6351  goto L190;
6352 
6353  gdel = 0;
6354  gssq = 0;
6355 
6356  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6357  ri = 0;
6358  gssq += fMIGRgs[i-1]*fMIGRgs[i-1];
6359 
6360  for(j = 1; j <= fNpar; ++j) {
6361  m = max(i, j);
6362  n = min(i, j);
6363  ndex = m*(m-1) / 2 + n;
6364  ri += fVhmat[ndex-1]*fMIGRgs[j-1];
6365  }
6366 
6367  fMIGRstep[i-1] = ri*-.5;
6368  gdel += fMIGRstep[i-1]*fMIGRgs[i-1];
6369  }
6370 
6371  if(gssq == 0) {
6372  mnwarn("D", "MIGRAD", " FIRST DERIVATIVES OF FCN ARE ALL ZERO");
6373  goto L300;
6374  }
6375 
6376 //*-*- if gdel positive, V not posdef
6377  if(gdel >= 0) {
6378  mnwarn("D", "MIGRAD", " NEWTON STEP NOT DESCENT.");
6379 
6380  if(npsdf == 1)
6381  goto L1;
6382 
6383  mnpsdf();
6384  npsdf = 1;
6385  goto L24;
6386  }
6387 
6388 //*-*- . . . . do line search
6389  mnline(fMIGRxxs, fs, fMIGRstep, gdel, toler);
6390 
6391  if(fAmin == fs)
6392  goto L200;
6393 
6394  fCfrom = "MIGRAD ";
6395  fNfcnfr = nfcnmg;
6396  fCstatu = "PROGRESS ";
6397 //*-*- . get gradient at new point
6398  mninex(fX);
6399 
6400  if(fISW[2] == 1) {
6401  Eval(nparx, fGin, fzero, fU, 2);
6402  ++fNfcn;
6403  }
6404 
6405  mnderi();
6406 //*-*- . calculate new EDM
6407  npsdf = 0;
6408 L81:
6409  fEDM = 0;
6410  gvg = 0;
6411  delgam = 0;
6412  gdgssq = 0;
6413 
6414  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6415  ri = 0;
6416  vgi = 0;
6417 
6418  for(j = 1; j <= fNpar; ++j) {
6419  m = max(i, j);
6420  n = min(i, j);
6421  ndex = m*(m-1) / 2 + n;
6422  vgi += fVhmat[ndex-1]*(fGrd[j-1] - fMIGRgs[j-1]);
6423  ri += fVhmat[ndex-1]*fGrd[j-1];
6424  }
6425 
6426  fMIGRvg[i-1] = vgi*.5;
6427  gami = fGrd[i-1] - fMIGRgs[i-1];
6428  gdgssq += gami*gami;
6429  gvg += gami*fMIGRvg[i-1];
6430  delgam += fDirin[i-1]*gami;
6431  fEDM += fGrd[i-1]*ri*.5;
6432  }
6433 
6434  fEDM = fEDM*.5*(fDcovar*3 + 1);
6435 
6436 //*-*- . if EDM negative, not positive-definite
6437  if(fEDM < 0 || gvg <= 0) {
6438  mnwarn("D", "MIGRAD", "NOT POS-DEF. EDM OR GVG NEGATIVE.");
6439  fCstatu = "NOT POSDEF";
6440 
6441  if(npsdf == 1)
6442  goto L230;
6443 
6444  mnpsdf();
6445  npsdf = 1;
6446  goto L81;
6447  }
6448 
6449 //*-*- print information about this iteration
6450  ++iter;
6451 
6452  if(iswtr >= 3 || (iswtr == 2 && iter % 10 == 1)) {
6453  mnwerr();
6454  mnprin(3, fAmin);
6455  }
6456 
6457  if(gdgssq == 0) {
6458  mnwarn("D", "MIGRAD", "NO CHANGE IN FIRST DERIVATIVES OVER LAST STEP");
6459  }
6460 
6461  if(delgam < 0) {
6462  mnwarn("D", "MIGRAD", "FIRST DERIVATIVES INCREASING ALONG SEARCH LINE");
6463  }
6464 
6465 //*-*- . update covariance matrix
6466  fCstatu = "IMPROVEMNT";
6467 
6468  if(ldebug) {
6469  printf(" VHMAT 1 =\n");
6470 
6471  for(kk = 1; kk <= 10; ++kk) {
6472  printf(" %10.2g\n", fVhmat[kk-1]);
6473  }
6474  }
6475 
6476  dsum = 0;
6477  vsum = 0;
6478 
6479  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6480  for(j = 1; j <= i; ++j) {
6481  if(delgam == 0 || gvg == 0)
6482  d = 0;
6483  else
6484  d = fDirin[i-1]*fDirin[j-1] / delgam - fMIGRvg[i-1]*fMIGRvg[j-1] / gvg;
6485 
6486  dsum += fabs(d);
6487  ndex = i*(i-1) / 2 + j;
6488  fVhmat[ndex-1] += d*2;
6489  vsum += fabs(fVhmat[ndex-1]);
6490  }
6491  }
6492 
6493 //*-*- smooth local fluctuations by averaging DCOVAR
6494  fDcovar = (fDcovar + dsum / vsum)*.5;
6495 
6496  if(iswtr >= 3 || ldebug) {
6497  printf(" RELATIVE CHANGE IN COV. MATRIX=%5.1f per cent\n", fDcovar*100);
6498  }
6499 
6500  if(ldebug) {
6501  printf(" VHMAT 2 =\n");
6502 
6503  for(kk = 1; kk <= 10; ++kk) {
6504  printf(" %10.3g\n", fVhmat[kk-1]);
6505  }
6506  }
6507 
6508  if(delgam <= gvg)
6509  goto L135;
6510 
6511  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6512  fMIGRflnu[i-1] = fDirin[i-1] / delgam - fMIGRvg[i-1] / gvg;
6513  }
6514 
6515  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6516  for(j = 1; j <= i; ++j) {
6517  ndex = i*(i-1) / 2 + j;
6518  fVhmat[ndex-1] += gvg*2*fMIGRflnu[i-1]*fMIGRflnu[j-1];
6519  }
6520  }
6521 
6522 L135:
6523 
6524 //*-*- and see if converged
6525  if(fEDM < rhotol*.1)
6526  goto L300;
6527 
6528 //*-*- if not, prepare next iteration
6529  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6530  fMIGRxxs[i-1] = fX[i-1];
6531  fMIGRgs[i-1] = fGrd[i-1];
6532  }
6533 
6534  fs = fAmin;
6535 
6536  if(fISW[1] == 0 && fDcovar < .5)
6537  fISW[1] = 1;
6538 
6539  if(fISW[1] == 3 && fDcovar > .1)
6540  fISW[1] = 1;
6541 
6542  if(fISW[1] == 1 && fDcovar < .05)
6543  fISW[1] = 3;
6544 
6545  goto L24;
6546 //*-*- . . . . . end main loop
6547 //*-*- . . call limit in MNMIGR
6548 L190:
6549  fISW[0] = 1;
6550 
6551  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
6552  printf(" CALL LIMIT EXCEEDED IN MIGRAD.\n");
6553  }
6554 
6555  fCstatu = "CALL LIMIT";
6556  goto L230;
6557 //*-*- . . fails to improve . .
6558 L200:
6559 
6560  if(iswtr >= 1) {
6561  printf(" MIGRAD FAILS TO FIND IMPROVEMENT\n");
6562  }
6563 
6564  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6565  fX[i-1] = fMIGRxxs[i-1];
6566  }
6567 
6568  if(fEDM < rhotol)
6569  goto L300;
6570 
6571  if(fEDM < fabs(fEpsma2*fAmin)) {
6572  if(iswtr >= 0) {
6573  printf(" MACHINE ACCURACY LIMITS FURTHER IMPROVEMENT.\n");
6574  }
6575 
6576  goto L300;
6577  }
6578 
6579  if(fIstrat < 1) {
6580  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
6581  printf(" MIGRAD FAILS WITH STRATEGY=0. WILL TRY WITH STRATEGY=1.\n");
6582  }
6583 
6584  fIstrat = 1;
6585  }
6586 
6587  goto L1;
6588 //*-*- . . fails to converge
6589 L230:
6590 
6591  if(iswtr >= 0) {
6592  printf(" MIGRAD TERMINATED WITHOUT CONVERGENCE.\n");
6593  }
6594 
6595  if(fISW[1] == 3)
6596  fISW[1] = 1;
6597 
6598  fISW[3] = -1;
6599  goto L400;
6600 //*-*- . . apparent convergence
6601 L300:
6602 
6603  if(iswtr >= 0) {
6604  printf(" MIGRAD MINIMIZATION HAS CONVERGED.\n");
6605  }
6606 
6607  if(fItaur == 0) {
6608  if(fIstrat >= 2 || (fIstrat == 1 && fISW[1] < 3)) {
6609  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
6610  printf(" MIGRAD WILL VERIFY CONVERGENCE AND ERROR MATRIX.\n");
6611  }
6612 
6613  mnhess();
6614  mnwerr();
6615  npsdf = 0;
6616 
6617  if(fEDM > rhotol)
6618  goto L10;
6619  }
6620  }
6621 
6622  fCstatu = "CONVERGED ";
6623  fISW[3] = 1;
6624 //*-*- come here in any case
6625 L400:
6626  fCfrom = "MIGRAD ";
6627  fNfcnfr = nfcnmg;
6628  mninex(fX);
6629  mnwerr();
6630 
6631  if(iswtr >= 0)
6632  mnprin(3, fAmin);
6633 
6634  if(iswtr >= 1)
6635  mnmatu(1);
6636 } /* mnmigr_ */
6637 
6638 //______________________________________________________________________________
6639 void TMinuit::mnmnos() {
6640 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Performs a MINOS error analysis*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6641 //*-* ===============================
6642 //*-* Performs a MINOS error analysis on those parameters for
6643 //*-* which it is requested on the MINOS command by calling
6644 //*-* MNMNOT for each parameter requested.
6645 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6646 
6647  /* Local variables */
6648  double val2mi, val2pl;
6649  int nbad, ilax, ilax2, ngood, nfcnmi, iin, knt;
6650 
6651  if(fNpar <= 0)
6652  goto L700;
6653 
6654  ngood = 0;
6655  nbad = 0;
6656  nfcnmi = fNfcn;
6657 
6658 //*-*- . loop over parameters requested
6659  for(knt = 1; knt <= fNpar; ++knt) {
6660  if(int(fWord7[1]) == 0) {
6661  ilax = fNexofi[knt-1];
6662  } else {
6663  if(knt >= 7)
6664  break;
6665 
6666  ilax = int(fWord7[knt]);
6667 
6668  if(ilax == 0)
6669  break;
6670 
6671  if(ilax > 0 && ilax <= fNu) {
6672  if(fNiofex[ilax-1] > 0)
6673  goto L565;
6674  }
6675 
6676  printf(" PARAMETER NUMBER %3d NOT A VARIABLE. IGNORED.\n", ilax);
6677  continue;
6678  }
6679 
6680 L565:
6681 //*-*- calculate one pair of M E s
6682  ilax2 = 0;
6683  mnmnot(ilax, ilax2, val2pl, val2mi);
6684 
6685  if(fLnewmn)
6686  goto L650;
6687 
6688 //*-*- update NGOOD and NBAD
6689  iin = fNiofex[ilax-1];
6690 
6691  if(fErp[iin-1] > 0)
6692  ++ngood;
6693  else ++nbad;
6694 
6695  if(fErn[iin-1] < 0)
6696  ++ngood;
6697  else ++nbad;
6698  }
6699 
6700 //*-*- end of loop . . . . . . .
6701 //*-*- . . . . printout final values .
6702  fCfrom = "MINOS ";
6703  fNfcnfr = nfcnmi;
6704  fCstatu = "UNCHANGED ";
6705 
6706  if(ngood == 0 && nbad == 0)
6707  goto L700;
6708 
6709  if(ngood > 0 && nbad == 0)
6710  fCstatu = "SUCCESSFUL";
6711 
6712  if(ngood == 0 && nbad > 0)
6713  fCstatu = "FAILURE ";
6714 
6715  if(ngood > 0 && nbad > 0)
6716  fCstatu = "PROBLEMS ";
6717 
6718  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
6719  mnprin(4, fAmin);
6720 
6721  if(fISW[4] >= 2)
6722  mnmatu(0);
6723 
6724  return;
6725 //*-*- . . . new minimum found . . . .
6726 L650:
6727  fCfrom = "MINOS ";
6728  fNfcnfr = nfcnmi;
6729  fCstatu = "NEW MINIMU";
6730 
6731  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
6732  mnprin(4, fAmin);
6733 
6734  printf(" NEW MINIMUM FOUND. GO BACK TO MINIMIZATION STEP.\n");
6735  printf(" =================================================\n");
6736  printf(" V\n");
6737  printf(" V\n");
6738  printf(" V\n");
6739  printf(" VVVVVVV\n");
6740  printf(" VVVVV\n");
6741  printf(" VVV\n");
6742  printf(" V\n\n");
6743  return;
6744 L700:
6745  printf(" THERE ARE NO MINOS ERRORS TO CALCULATE.\n");
6746 } /* mnmnos_ */
6747 
6748 //______________________________________________________________________________
6749 void TMinuit::mnmnot(int ilax, int ilax2, double& val2pl, double& val2mi) {
6750 //*-*-*-*-*-*Performs a MINOS error analysis on one parameter*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6751 //*-* ================================================
6752 //*-* The parameter ILAX is varied, and the minimum of the
6753 //*-* function with respect to the other parameters is followed
6754 //*-* until it crosses the value FMIN+UP.
6755 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6756 
6757  /* System generated locals */
6758  int i__1;
6759 
6760  /* Local variables */
6761  double delu, aopt, eros;
6762  double abest, xunit, dc, ut, sigsav, du1;
6763  double fac, sig, sav;
6764  int marc, isig, mpar, ndex, imax, indx, ierr, i, j;
6765  int iercr, it, istrav, nfmxin, nlimit, isw2, isw4;
6766  string csig;
6767 
6768 //*-*- . . save and prepare start vals
6769  isw2 = fISW[1];
6770  isw4 = fISW[3];
6771  sigsav = fEDM;
6772  istrav = fIstrat;
6773  dc = fDcovar;
6774  fLnewmn = false;
6775  fApsi = fEpsi*.5;
6776  abest = fAmin;
6777  mpar = fNpar;
6778  nfmxin = fNfcnmx;
6779 
6780  for(i = 1; i <= mpar; ++i) {
6781  fXt[i-1] = fX[i-1];
6782  }
6783 
6784  i__1 = mpar*(mpar + 1) / 2;
6785 
6786  for(j = 1; j <= i__1; ++j) {
6787  fVthmat[j-1] = fVhmat[j-1];
6788  }
6789 
6790  for(i = 1; i <= mpar; ++i) {
6791  fMNOTgcc[i-1] = fGlobcc[i-1];
6792  fMNOTw[i-1] = fWerr[i-1];
6793  }
6794 
6795  it = fNiofex[ilax-1];
6796  fErp[it-1] = 0;
6797  fErn[it-1] = 0;
6798  mninex(fXt);
6799  ut = fU[ilax-1];
6800 
6801  if(fNvarl[ilax-1] == 1) {
6802  fAlim[ilax-1] = ut - fMNOTw[it-1]*100;
6803  fBlim[ilax-1] = ut + fMNOTw[it-1]*100;
6804  }
6805 
6806  ndex = it*(it + 1) / 2;
6807  xunit = sqrt(fUp / fVthmat[ndex-1]);
6808  marc = 0;
6809 
6810  for(i = 1; i <= mpar; ++i) {
6811  if(i == it)
6812  continue;
6813 
6814  ++marc;
6815  imax = max(it, i);
6816  indx = imax*(imax-1) / 2 + min(it, i);
6817  fMNOTxdev[marc-1] = xunit*fVthmat[indx-1];
6818  }
6819 
6820 //*-*- fix the parameter in question
6821  mnfixp(it-1, ierr);
6822 
6823  if(ierr > 0) {
6824  printf(" MINUIT ERROR. CANNOT FIX PARAMETER %4d INTERNAL %3d\n", ilax, it);
6825  goto L700;
6826  }
6827 
6828 //*-*- . . . . . Nota Bene: from here on, NPAR=MPAR-1
6829 //*-*- Remember: MNFIXP squeezes IT out of X, XT, WERR, and VHMAT,
6830 //*-*- not W, VTHMAT
6831  for(isig = 1; isig <= 2; ++isig) {
6832  if(isig == 1) {
6833  sig = 1;
6834  csig = "POSI";
6835  } else {
6836  sig = -1;
6837  csig = "NEGA";
6838  }
6839 
6840 //*-*- . sig=sign of error being calcd
6841  if(fISW[4] > 1) {
6842  printf(" DETERMINATION OF %sTIVE MINOS ERROR FOR PARAMETER %d %s"
6843  , csig.c_str(), ilax
6844  , fCpnam[ilax-1].c_str());
6845  }
6846 
6847  if(fISW[1] <= 0) {
6848  mnwarn("D", "MINOS", "NO COVARIANCE MATRIX.");
6849  }
6850 
6851  nlimit = fNfcn + nfmxin;
6852  fIstrat = max(istrav-1, 0);
6853  du1 = fMNOTw[it-1];
6854  fU[ilax-1] = ut + sig*du1;
6855  fU[ilax-1] = min(fU[ilax-1], fBlim[ilax-1]);
6856  fU[ilax-1] = max(fU[ilax-1], fAlim[ilax-1]);
6857  delu = fU[ilax-1] - ut;
6858 
6859 //*-*- stop if already at limit with negligible step size
6860  if(fabs(delu) / (fabs(ut) + fabs(fU[ilax-1])) < fEpsmac)
6861  goto L440;
6862 
6863  fac = delu / fMNOTw[it-1];
6864 
6865  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
6866  fX[i-1] = fXt[i-1] + fac*fMNOTxdev[i-1];
6867  }
6868 
6869  if(fISW[4] > 1) {
6870  printf(" PARAMETER %4d SET TO%11.3e + %10.3e = %12.3e\n", ilax, ut, delu, fU[ilax-1]);
6871  }
6872 
6873 //*-*- loop to hit AMIN+UP
6874  fKe1cr = ilax;
6875  fKe2cr = 0;
6876  fXmidcr = fU[ilax-1];
6877  fXdircr = delu;
6878 
6879  fAmin = abest;
6880  fNfcnmx = nlimit - fNfcn;
6881  mncros(aopt, iercr);
6882 
6883  if(abest - fAmin > fUp*.01)
6884  goto L650;
6885 
6886  if(iercr == 1)
6887  goto L440;
6888 
6889  if(iercr == 2)
6890  goto L450;
6891 
6892  if(iercr == 3)
6893  goto L460;
6894 
6895 //*-*- . error successfully calculated
6896  eros = fXmidcr - ut + aopt*fXdircr;
6897 
6898  if(fISW[4] > 1) {
6899  printf(" THE %4sTIVE MINOS ERROR OF PARAMETER %3d %10s, IS %12.4e"
6900  , csig.c_str(), ilax
6901  , fCpnam[ilax-1].c_str(), eros);
6902  }
6903 
6904  goto L480;
6905 //*-*- . . . . . . . . failure returns
6906 L440:
6907 
6908  if(fISW[4] >= 1) {
6909  printf(" THE %4sTIVE MINOS ERROR OF PARAMETER %3d, %s EXCEEDS ITS LIMIT."
6910  , csig.c_str(), ilax
6911  , fCpnam[ilax-1].c_str());
6912  }
6913 
6914  eros = fUndefi;
6915  goto L480;
6916 L450:
6917 
6918  if(fISW[4] >= 1) {
6919  printf(" THE %4sTIVE MINOS ERROR %4d REQUIRES MORE THAN %5d FUNCTION CALLS."
6920  , csig.c_str(), ilax, nfmxin);
6921  }
6922 
6923  eros = 0;
6924  goto L480;
6925 L460:
6926 
6927  if(fISW[4] >= 1) {
6928  printf(" %4sTIVE MINOS ERROR NOT CALCULATED FOR PARAMETER %d"
6929  , csig.c_str(), ilax);
6930  }
6931 
6932  eros = 0;
6933 
6934 L480:
6935 
6936  if(fISW[4] > 1) {
6937  printf(" **************************************************************************\n");
6938  }
6939 
6940  if(sig < 0) {
6941  fErn[it-1] = eros;
6942 
6943  if(ilax2 > 0 && ilax2 <= fNu)
6944  val2mi = fU[ilax2-1];
6945  } else {
6946  fErp[it-1] = eros;
6947 
6948  if(ilax2 > 0 && ilax2 <= fNu)
6949  val2pl = fU[ilax2-1];
6950  }
6951  }
6952 
6953 //*-*- . . parameter finished. reset v
6954 //*-*- normal termination */
6955  fItaur = 1;
6956  mnfree(1);
6957  i__1 = mpar*(mpar + 1) / 2;
6958 
6959  for(j = 1; j <= i__1; ++j) {
6960  fVhmat[j-1] = fVthmat[j-1];
6961  }
6962 
6963  for(i = 1; i <= mpar; ++i) {
6964  fWerr[i-1] = fMNOTw[i-1];
6965  fGlobcc[i-1] = fMNOTgcc[i-1];
6966  fX[i-1] = fXt[i-1];
6967  }
6968 
6969  mninex(fX);
6970  fEDM = sigsav;
6971  fAmin = abest;
6972  fISW[1] = isw2;
6973  fISW[3] = isw4;
6974  fDcovar = dc;
6975  goto L700;
6976 //*-*- new minimum
6977 L650:
6978  fLnewmn = true;
6979  fISW[1] = 0;
6980  fDcovar = 1;
6981  fISW[3] = 0;
6982  sav = fU[ilax-1];
6983  fItaur = 1;
6984  mnfree(1);
6985  fU[ilax-1] = sav;
6986  mnexin(fX);
6987  fEDM = fBigedm;
6988 //*-*- in any case
6989 L700:
6990  fItaur = 0;
6991  fNfcnmx = nfmxin;
6992  fIstrat = istrav;
6993 } /* mnmnot_ */
6994 
6995 //______________________________________________________________________________
6996 void TMinuit::mnparm(int k1, string cnamj, double uk, double wk, double a, double b, int& ierflg) {
6997 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Implements one parameter definition*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
6998 //*-* ===================================
6999 //*-* Called from MNPARS and user-callable
7000 //*-* Implements one parameter definition, that is:
7001 //*-* K (external) parameter number
7002 //*-* CNAMK parameter name
7003 //*-* UK starting value
7004 //*-* WK starting step size or uncertainty
7005 //*-* A, B lower and upper physical parameter limits
7006 //*-* and sets up (updates) the parameter lists.
7007 //*-* Output: IERFLG=0 if no problems
7008 //*-* >0 if MNPARM unable to implement definition
7009 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7010 
7011  /* Local variables */
7012  double vplu, a_small, gsmin, pinti, vminu, danger, sav, sav2;
7013  int ierr, kint, in, ix, ktofix, lastin, kinfix, nvl;
7014  string cnamk, chbufi;
7015 
7016  int k = k1+1;
7017  cnamk = cnamj;
7018  kint = fNpar;
7019 
7020  if(k < 1 || k > fMaxext) {
7021 //*-*- parameter number exceeds allowed maximum value
7022  printf(" MINUIT USER ERROR. PARAMETER NUMBER IS %3d ALLOWED RANGE IS ONE TO %4d\n", k, fMaxext);
7023  goto L800;
7024  }
7025 
7026 //*-*- normal parameter request
7027  ktofix = 0;
7028 
7029  if(fNvarl[k-1] < 0)
7030  goto L50;
7031 
7032 //*-*- previously defined parameter is being redefined
7033 //*-*- find if parameter was fixed
7034  for(ix = 1; ix <= fNpfix; ++ix) {
7035  if(fIpfix[ix-1] == k)
7036  ktofix = k;
7037  }
7038 
7039  if(ktofix > 0) {
7040  mnwarn("W", "PARAM DEF", "REDEFINING A FIXED PARAMETER.");
7041 
7042  if(kint >= fMaxint) {
7043  printf(" CANNOT RELEASE. MAX NPAR EXCEEDED.\n");
7044  goto L800;
7045  }
7046 
7047  mnfree(-k);
7048  }
7049 
7050 //*-*- if redefining previously variable parameter
7051  if(fNiofex[k-1] > 0)
7052  kint = fNpar - 1;
7053 
7054 L50:
7055 
7056 //*-*- . . .print heading
7057  if(fLphead && fISW[4] >= 0) {
7058  printf(" PARAMETER DEFINITIONS:\n");
7059  printf(" NO. NAME VALUE STEP SIZE LIMITS\n");
7060  fLphead = false;
7061  }
7062 
7063  if(wk > 0)
7064  goto L122;
7065 
7066 //*-*- . . .constant parameter . . . .
7067  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
7068  printf(" %5d %-10s %13.5e constant\n", k, cnamk.c_str(), uk);
7069  }
7070 
7071  nvl = 0;
7072  goto L200;
7073 L122:
7074 
7075  if(a == 0 && b == 0) {
7076 //*-*- variable parameter without limits
7077  nvl = 1;
7078 
7079  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
7080  printf(" %5d %-10s %13.5e%13.5e no limits\n", k, cnamk.c_str(), uk, wk);
7081  }
7082  } else {
7083 //*-*- variable parameter with limits
7084  nvl = 4;
7085  fLnolim = false;
7086 
7087  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
7088  printf(" %5d %-10s %13.5e%13.5e %13.5e%13.5e\n", k, cnamk.c_str(), uk, wk, a, b);
7089  }
7090  }
7091 
7092 //*-*- . . request for another variable parameter
7093  ++kint;
7094 
7095  if(kint > fMaxint) {
7096  printf(" MINUIT USER ERROR. TOO MANY VARIABLE PARAMETERS.\n");
7097  goto L800;
7098  }
7099 
7100  if(nvl == 1)
7101  goto L200;
7102 
7103  if(a == b) {
7104  printf(" USER ERROR IN MINUIT PARAMETER\n");
7105  printf(" DEFINITION\n");
7106  printf(" UPPER AND LOWER LIMITS EQUAL.\n");
7107  goto L800;
7108  }
7109 
7110  if(b < a) {
7111  sav = b;
7112  b = a;
7113  a = sav;
7114  mnwarn("W", "PARAM DEF", "PARAMETER LIMITS WERE REVERSED.");
7115 
7116  if(fLwarn)
7117  fLphead = true;
7118  }
7119 
7120  if(b - a > 1e7) {
7121  mnwarn("W", "PARAM DEF", local_Form("LIMITS ON PARAM%d TOO FAR APART.", k).c_str());
7122 
7123  if(fLwarn)
7124  fLphead = true;
7125  }
7126 
7127  danger = (b - uk)*(uk - a);
7128 
7129  if(danger < 0) {
7130  mnwarn("W", "PARAM DEF", "STARTING VALUE OUTSIDE LIMITS.");
7131  }
7132 
7133  if(danger == 0) {
7134  mnwarn("W", "PARAM DEF", "STARTING VALUE IS AT LIMIT.");
7135  }
7136 
7137 L200:
7138 //*-*- . . . input OK, set values, arrange lists,
7139 //*-*- calculate step sizes GSTEP, DIRIN
7140  fCfrom = "PARAMETR";
7141  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
7142  fCstatu = "NEW VALUES";
7143  fNu = max(fNu, k);
7144  fCpnam[k-1] = cnamk;
7145  fU[k-1] = uk;
7146  fAlim[k-1] = a;
7147  fBlim[k-1] = b;
7148  fNvarl[k-1] = nvl;
7149  mnrset(1);
7150 //*-*- K is external number of new parameter
7151 //*-*- LASTIN is the number of var. params with ext. param. no.< K
7152  lastin = 0;
7153 
7154  for(ix = 1; ix <= k-1; ++ix) {
7155  if(fNiofex[ix-1] > 0)
7156  ++lastin;
7157  }
7158 
7159 //*-*- KINT is new number of variable params, NPAR is old
7160  if(kint == fNpar)
7161  goto L280;
7162 
7163  if(kint > fNpar) {
7164 //*-*- insert new variable parameter in list
7165  for(in = fNpar; in >= lastin + 1; --in) {
7166  ix = fNexofi[in-1];
7167  fNiofex[ix-1] = in + 1;
7168  fNexofi[in] = ix;
7169  fX[in] = fX[in-1];
7170  fXt[in] = fXt[in-1];
7171  fDirin[in] = fDirin[in-1];
7172  fG2[in] = fG2[in-1];
7173  fGstep[in] = fGstep[in-1];
7174  fWerr[in] = fWerr[in-1];
7175  fGrd[in] = fGrd[in-1];
7176  }
7177  } else {
7178 //*-*- remove variable parameter from list
7179  for(in = lastin + 1; in <= kint; ++in) {
7180  ix = fNexofi[in];
7181  fNiofex[ix-1] = in;
7182  fNexofi[in-1] = ix;
7183  fX[in-1] = fX[in];
7184  fXt[in-1] = fXt[in];
7185  fDirin[in-1] = fDirin[in];
7186  fG2[in-1] = fG2[in];
7187  fGstep[in-1] = fGstep[in];
7188  fWerr[in-1] = fWerr[in];
7189  fGrd[in-1] = fGrd[in];
7190  }
7191  }
7192 
7193 L280:
7194  ix = k;
7195  fNiofex[ix-1] = 0;
7196  fNpar = kint;
7197 
7198 //*-*- lists are now arranged . . . .
7199  if(nvl > 0) {
7200  in = lastin + 1;
7201  fNexofi[in-1] = ix;
7202  fNiofex[ix-1] = in;
7203  sav = fU[ix-1];
7204  mnpint(sav, ix-1, pinti);
7205  fX[in-1] = pinti;
7206  fXt[in-1] = fX[in-1];
7207  fWerr[in-1] = wk;
7208  sav2 = sav + wk;
7209  mnpint(sav2, ix-1, pinti);
7210  vplu = pinti - fX[in-1];
7211  sav2 = sav - wk;
7212  mnpint(sav2, ix-1, pinti);
7213  vminu = pinti - fX[in-1];
7214  fDirin[in-1] = (fabs(vplu) + fabs(vminu))*.5;
7215  fG2[in-1] = fUp*2 / (fDirin[in-1]*fDirin[in-1]);
7216  gsmin = fEpsma2*8*fabs(fX[in-1]);
7217  fGstep[in-1] = max(gsmin, fDirin[in-1]*.1);
7218 
7219  if(fAmin != fUndefi) {
7220  a_small = sqrt(fEpsma2*(fAmin + fUp) / fUp);
7221  fGstep[in-1] = max(gsmin, a_small*fDirin[in-1]);
7222  }
7223 
7224  fGrd[in-1] = fG2[in-1]*fDirin[in-1];
7225 
7226 //*-*- if parameter has limits
7227  if(fNvarl[k-1] > 1) {
7228  if(fGstep[in-1] > .5)
7229  fGstep[in-1] = .5;
7230 
7231  fGstep[in-1] = -fGstep[in-1];
7232  }
7233  }
7234 
7235  if(ktofix > 0) {
7236  kinfix = fNiofex[ktofix-1];
7237 
7238  if(kinfix > 0)
7239  mnfixp(kinfix-1, ierr);
7240 
7241  if(ierr > 0)
7242  goto L800;
7243  }
7244 
7245  ierflg = 0;
7246  return;
7247 //*-*- error on input, unable to implement request . . . .
7248 L800:
7249  ierflg = 1;
7250 } /* mnparm_ */
7251 
7252 //______________________________________________________________________________
7253 void TMinuit::mnpars(string& crdbuf, int& icondn) {
7254 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Implements one parameter definition*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7255 //*-* =========== =======================
7256 //*-* Called from MNREAD and user-callable
7257 //*-* Implements one parameter definition, that is:
7258 //*-* parses the string CRDBUF and calls MNPARM
7259 //*-*
7260 //*-* output conditions:
7261 //*-* ICONDN = 0 all OK
7262 //*-* ICONDN = 1 error, attempt to define parameter is ignored
7263 //*-* ICONDN = 2 end of parameter definitions
7264 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7265 
7266  /* Local variables */
7267  double a=0, b=0, fk=0, uk=0, wk=0, xk=0;
7268  int ierr, kapo1, kapo2;
7269  int k, llist, ibegin, lenbuf, istart, lnc, icy;
7270  string cnamk, comand, celmnt, ctemp;
7271  char stmp[128];
7272 
7273  lenbuf = strlen(crdbuf.c_str());
7274 //*-*- find out whether fixed or free-field format
7275  kapo1 = strspn(crdbuf.c_str(), "'");
7276 
7277  if(kapo1 == 0)
7278  goto L150;
7279 
7280  kapo2 = strspn(crdbuf.c_str() + kapo1, "'");
7281 
7282  if(kapo2 == 0)
7283  goto L150;
7284 
7285 //*-*- new (free-field) format
7286  kapo2 += kapo1;
7287 
7288 //*-*- skip leading blanks if any
7289  for(istart = 1; istart <= kapo1-1; ++istart) {
7290  if(crdbuf[istart-1] != ' ')
7291  goto L120;
7292  }
7293 
7294  goto L210;
7295 L120:
7296 //*-*- parameter number integer
7297  celmnt = crdbuf.substr(istart-1, kapo1-istart);
7298 
7299  if(scanf(celmnt.c_str(), &fk)) {;}
7300 
7301  k = int(fk);
7302 
7303  if(k <= 0)
7304  goto L210;
7305 
7306  cnamk = "PARAM " + celmnt;
7307 
7308  if(kapo2 - kapo1 > 1) {
7309  cnamk = crdbuf.substr(kapo1, kapo2-1-kapo1);
7310  }
7311 
7312 //*-* special handling if comma or blanks and a comma follow 'name'
7313  for(icy = kapo2 + 1; icy <= lenbuf; ++icy) {
7314  if(crdbuf[icy-1] == ',')
7315  goto L139;
7316 
7317  if(crdbuf[icy-1] != ' ')
7318  goto L140;
7319  }
7320 
7321  uk = 0;
7322  wk = 0;
7323  a = 0;
7324  b = 0;
7325  goto L170;
7326 L139:
7327  ++icy;
7328 L140:
7329  ibegin = icy;
7330  ctemp = crdbuf.substr(ibegin-1, lenbuf-ibegin);
7331  mncrck(ctemp, 20, comand, lnc, fMaxpar, fPARSplist, llist, ierr, fIsyswr);
7332 
7333  if(ierr > 0)
7334  goto L180;
7335 
7336  uk = fPARSplist[0];
7337  wk = 0;
7338 
7339  if(llist >= 2)
7340  wk = fPARSplist[1];
7341 
7342  a = 0;
7343 
7344  if(llist >= 3)
7345  a = fPARSplist[2];
7346 
7347  b = 0;
7348 
7349  if(llist >= 4)
7350  b = fPARSplist[3];
7351 
7352  goto L170;
7353 //*-*- old (fixed-field) format
7354 L150:
7355 
7356  if(scanf(crdbuf.c_str(), &xk, stmp, &uk, &wk, &a, &b)) {;}
7357 
7358  cnamk = stmp;
7359  k = int(xk);
7360 
7361  if(k == 0)
7362  goto L210;
7363 
7364 //*-*- parameter format cracked, implement parameter definition
7365 L170:
7366  mnparm(k-1, cnamk, uk, wk, a, b, ierr);
7367  icondn = ierr;
7368  return;
7369 //*-*- format or other error
7370 L180:
7371  icondn = 1;
7372  return;
7373 //*-*- end of data
7374 L210:
7375  icondn = 2;
7376 } /* mnpars_ */
7377 
7378 //______________________________________________________________________________
7379 void TMinuit::mnpfit(double* parx2p, double* pary2p, int npar2p, double* coef2p, double& sdev2p) {
7380 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*To fit a parabola to npar2p points*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7381 //*-* ==================================
7382 //*-* npar2p no. of points
7383 //*-* parx2p(i) x value of point i
7384 //*-* pary2p(i) y value of point i
7385 //*-*
7386 //*-* coef2p(1...3) coefficients of the fitted parabola
7387 //*-* y=coef2p(1) + coef2p(2)*x + coef2p(3)*x**2
7388 //*-* sdev2p= variance
7389 //*-* method : chi**2 = min equation solved explicitly
7390 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7391 
7392  /* Local variables */
7393  double a, f, s, t, y, s2, x2, x3, x4, y2, cz[3], xm, xy, x2y;
7394  x2 = x3 = 0;
7395  int i;
7396 
7397  /* Parameter adjustments */
7398  --coef2p;
7399  --pary2p;
7400  --parx2p;
7401 
7402  /* Function Body */
7403  for(i = 1; i <= 3; ++i) {
7404  cz[i-1] = 0;
7405  }
7406 
7407  sdev2p = 0;
7408 
7409  if(npar2p < 3)
7410  goto L10;
7411 
7412  f = (double)(npar2p);
7413 //*-* --- center x values for reasons of machine precision
7414  xm = 0;
7415 
7416  for(i = 1; i <= npar2p; ++i) {
7417  xm += parx2p[i];
7418  }
7419 
7420  xm /= f;
7421  x2 = 0;
7422  x3 = 0;
7423  x4 = 0;
7424  y = 0;
7425  y2 = 0;
7426  xy = 0;
7427  x2y = 0;
7428 
7429  for(i = 1; i <= npar2p; ++i) {
7430  s = parx2p[i] - xm;
7431  t = pary2p[i];
7432  s2 = s*s;
7433  x2 += s2;
7434  x3 += s*s2;
7435  x4 += s2*s2;
7436  y += t;
7437  y2 += t*t;
7438  xy += s*t;
7439  x2y += s2*t;
7440  }
7441 
7442  a = (f*x4 - x2*x2)*x2 - f*(x3*x3);
7443 
7444  if(a == 0)
7445  goto L10;
7446 
7447  cz[2] = (x2*(f*x2y - x2*y) - f*x3*xy) / a;
7448  cz[1] = (xy - x3*cz[2]) / x2;
7449  cz[0] = (y - x2*cz[2]) / f;
7450 
7451  if(npar2p == 3)
7452  goto L6;
7453 
7454  sdev2p = y2 - (cz[0]*y + cz[1]*xy + cz[2]*x2y);
7455 
7456  if(sdev2p < 0)
7457  sdev2p = 0;
7458 
7459  sdev2p /= f - 3;
7460 L6:
7461  cz[0] += xm*(xm*cz[2] - cz[1]);
7462  cz[1] -= xm*2*cz[2];
7463 L10:
7464 
7465  for(i = 1; i <= 3; ++i) {
7466  coef2p[i] = cz[i-1];
7467  }
7468 } /* mnpfit_ */
7469 
7470 //______________________________________________________________________________
7471 void TMinuit::mnpint(double& pexti, int i1, double& pinti) {
7472 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*Calculates the internal parameter value PINTI*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7473 //*-* =============================================
7474 //*-* corresponding to the external value PEXTI for parameter I.
7475 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7476 
7477  /* Local variables */
7478  double a, alimi, blimi, yy, yy2;
7479  int igo;
7480  string chbuf2, chbufi;
7481 
7482  int i = i1+1;
7483  pinti = pexti;
7484  igo = fNvarl[i-1];
7485 
7486  if(igo == 4) {
7487 //*-* -- there are two limits
7488  alimi = fAlim[i-1];
7489  blimi = fBlim[i-1];
7490  yy = (pexti - alimi)*2 / (blimi - alimi) - 1;
7491  yy2 = yy*yy;
7492 
7493  if(yy2 >= 1 - fEpsma2) {
7494  if(yy < 0) {
7495  a = fVlimlo;
7496  chbuf2 = " IS AT ITS LOWER ALLOWED LIMIT.";
7497  } else {
7498  a = fVlimhi;
7499  chbuf2 = " IS AT ITS UPPER ALLOWED LIMIT.";
7500  }
7501 
7502  pinti = a;
7503  pexti = alimi + (blimi - alimi)*.5*(sin(a) + 1);
7504  fLimset = true;
7505 
7506  if(yy2 > 1)
7507  chbuf2 = " BROUGHT BACK INSIDE LIMITS.";
7508 
7509  mnwarn("W", fCfrom.c_str(), local_Form("VARIABLE%d%s", i, chbuf2.c_str()).c_str());
7510  } else {
7511  pinti = asin(yy);
7512  }
7513  }
7514 } /* mnpint_ */
7515 
7516 //______________________________________________________________________________
7517 void TMinuit::mnplot(double* xpt, double* ypt, char* chpt, int nxypt, int npagwd, int npagln) {
7518 //*-*-*-*Plots points in array xypt onto one page with labelled axes*-*-*-*-*
7519 //*-* ===========================================================
7520 //*-* NXYPT is the number of points to be plotted
7521 //*-* XPT(I) = x-coord. of ith point
7522 //*-* YPT(I) = y-coord. of ith point
7523 //*-* CHPT(I) = character to be plotted at this position
7524 //*-* the input point arrays XPT, YPT, CHPT are destroyed.
7525 //*-*
7526 //*-*
7527 //*-* If fGraphicsmode is true (default), a TGraph object is produced
7528 //*-* via the Plug-in handler. To get the plot, you can do:
7529 //*-* TGraph *gr = (TGraph*)gMinuit->GetPlot();
7530 //*-* gr->Draw("al");
7531 //*-*
7532 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7533 
7534 
7535  static string cdot = ".";
7536  static string cslash = "/";
7537 
7538  /* Local variables */
7539  double xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, savx, savy, yprt;
7540  double bwidx, bwidy, xbest, ybest, ax, ay, bx, by;
7541  double xvalus[12], any, dxx, dyy;
7542  int iten, i, j, k, maxnx, maxny, iquit, ni, linodd;
7543  int nxbest, nybest, km1, ibk, isp1, nx, ny, ks, ix;
7544  string chmess, ctemp;
7545  bool overpr;
7546  char cline[120];
7547  char chsav, chbest;
7548 
7549  /* Function Body */
7550 //*-* Computing MIN
7551  maxnx = min(npagwd-20, 100);
7552 
7553  if(maxnx < 10)
7554  maxnx = 10;
7555 
7556  maxny = npagln;
7557 
7558  if(maxny < 10)
7559  maxny = 10;
7560 
7561  if(nxypt <= 1)
7562  return;
7563 
7564  xbest = xpt[0];
7565  ybest = ypt[0];
7566  chbest = chpt[0];
7567 //*-*- order the points by decreasing y
7568  km1 = nxypt - 1;
7569 
7570  for(i = 1; i <= km1; ++i) {
7571  iquit = 0;
7572  ni = nxypt - i;
7573 
7574  for(j = 1; j <= ni; ++j) {
7575  if(ypt[j-1] > ypt[j])
7576  continue;
7577 
7578  savx = xpt[j-1];
7579  xpt[j-1] = xpt[j];
7580  xpt[j] = savx;
7581  savy = ypt[j-1];
7582  ypt[j-1] = ypt[j];
7583  ypt[j] = savy;
7584  chsav = chpt[j-1];
7585  chpt[j-1]= chpt[j];
7586  chpt[j] = chsav;
7587  iquit = 1;
7588  }
7589 
7590  if(iquit == 0)
7591  break;
7592  }
7593 
7594 //*-*- find extreme values
7595  xmax = xpt[0];
7596  xmin = xmax;
7597 
7598  for(i = 1; i <= nxypt; ++i) {
7599  if(xpt[i-1] > xmax)
7600  xmax = xpt[i-1];
7601 
7602  if(xpt[i-1] < xmin)
7603  xmin = xpt[i-1];
7604  }
7605 
7606  dxx = (xmax - xmin)*.001;
7607  xmax += dxx;
7608  xmin -= dxx;
7609  mnbins(xmin, xmax, maxnx, xmin, xmax, nx, bwidx);
7610  ymax = ypt[0];
7611  ymin = ypt[nxypt-1];
7612 
7613  if(ymax == ymin)
7614  ymax = ymin + 1;
7615 
7616  dyy = (ymax - ymin)*.001;
7617  ymax += dyy;
7618  ymin -= dyy;
7619  mnbins(ymin, ymax, maxny, ymin, ymax, ny, bwidy);
7620  any = (double) ny;
7621 
7622 //*-*- if first point is blank, it is an 'origin'
7623  if(chbest == ' ')
7624  goto L50;
7625 
7626  xbest = (xmax + xmin)*.5;
7627  ybest = (ymax + ymin)*.5;
7628 L50:
7629 //*-*- find scale constants
7630  ax = 1 / bwidx;
7631  ay = 1 / bwidy;
7632  bx = -ax*xmin + 2;
7633  by = -ay*ymin - 2;
7634 
7635 //*-*- convert points to grid positions
7636  for(i = 1; i <= nxypt; ++i) {
7637  xpt[i-1] = ax*xpt[i-1] + bx;
7638  ypt[i-1] = any - ay*ypt[i-1] - by;
7639  }
7640 
7641  nxbest = int((ax*xbest + bx));
7642  nybest = int((any - ay*ybest - by));
7643 //*-*- print the points
7644  ny += 2;
7645  nx += 2;
7646  isp1 = 1;
7647  linodd = 1;
7648  overpr = false;
7649 
7650  for(i = 1; i <= ny; ++i) {
7651  for(ibk = 1; ibk <= nx; ++ibk) {
7652  cline[ibk-1] = ' ';
7653  }
7654 
7655  cline[nx] = '\0';
7656  cline[nx+1] = '\0';
7657  cline[0] = '.';
7658  cline[nx-1] = '.';
7659  cline[nxbest-1] = '.';
7660 
7661  if(i != 1 && i != nybest && i != ny)
7662  goto L320;
7663 
7664  for(j = 1; j <= nx; ++j) {
7665  cline[j-1] = '.';
7666  }
7667 
7668 L320:
7669  yprt = ymax - double(i-1)*bwidy;
7670 
7671  if(isp1 > nxypt)
7672  goto L350;
7673 
7674 //*-*- find the points to be plotted on this line
7675  for(k = isp1; k <= nxypt; ++k) {
7676  ks = int(ypt[k-1]);
7677 
7678  if(ks > i)
7679  goto L345;
7680 
7681  ix = int(xpt[k-1]);
7682 
7683  if(cline[ix-1] == '.')
7684  goto L340;
7685 
7686  if(cline[ix-1] == ' ')
7687  goto L340;
7688 
7689  if(cline[ix-1] == chpt[k-1])
7690  continue;
7691 
7692  overpr = true;
7693 //*-*- OVERPR is true if one or more positions contains more than
7694 //*-*- one point
7695  cline[ix-1] = '&';
7696  continue;
7697 L340:
7698  cline[ix-1] = chpt[k-1];
7699  }
7700 
7701  isp1 = nxypt + 1;
7702  goto L350;
7703 L345:
7704  isp1 = k;
7705 L350:
7706 
7707  if(linodd == 1 || i == ny)
7708  goto L380;
7709 
7710  linodd = 1;
7711  ctemp = cline;
7712  printf(" %s\n", ctemp.c_str());
7713  goto L400;
7714 L380:
7715  ctemp = cline;
7716  printf(" %14.7g ..%s\n", yprt, ctemp.c_str());
7717  linodd = 0;
7718 L400:
7719  ;
7720  }
7721 
7722 //*-*- print labels on x-axis every ten columns
7723  for(ibk = 1; ibk <= nx; ++ibk) {
7724  cline[ibk-1] = ' ';
7725 
7726  if(ibk % 10 == 1)
7727  cline[ibk-1] = '/';
7728  }
7729 
7730  printf(" %s\n", cline);
7731 
7732  for(ibk = 1; ibk <= 12; ++ibk) {
7733  xvalus[ibk-1] = xmin + double(ibk-1)*10*bwidx;
7734  }
7735 
7736  printf(" \n");
7737  iten = (nx + 9) / 10;
7738 
7739  for(ibk = 1; ibk <= iten; ++ibk) {
7740  printf(" %9.4g\n", xvalus[ibk-1]);
7741  }
7742 
7743  chmess = " ";
7744 
7745  if(overpr)
7746  chmess = " Overprint character is &";
7747 
7748  printf(" ONE COLUMN=%13.7g%s\n", bwidx, chmess.c_str());
7749 } /* mnplot_ */
7750 
7751 //______________________________________________________________________________
7752 void TMinuit::mnpout(int iuext1, string& chnam, double& val, double& err, double& xlolim, double& xuplim,
7753  int& iuint) const {
7754 //*-*-*-*Provides the user with information concerning the current status*-*-*
7755 //*-* ================================================================
7756 //*-* of parameter number IUEXT. Namely, it returns:
7757 //*-* CHNAM: the name of the parameter
7758 //*-* VAL: the current (external) value of the parameter
7759 //*-* ERR: the current estimate of the parameter uncertainty
7760 //*-* XLOLIM: the lower bound (or zero if no limits)
7761 //*-* XUPLIM: the upper bound (or zero if no limits)
7762 //*-* IUINT: the internal parameter number (or zero if not variable,
7763 //*-* or negative if undefined).
7764 //*-* Note also: If IUEXT is negative, then it is -internal parameter
7765 //*-* number, and IUINT is returned as the EXTERNAL number.
7766 //*-* Except for IUINT, this is exactly the inverse of MNPARM
7767 //*-* User-called
7768 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7769 
7770  /* Local variables */
7771  int iint, iext, nvl;
7772 
7773  int iuext = iuext1 + 1;
7774  xlolim = 0;
7775  xuplim = 0;
7776  err = 0;
7777 
7778  if(iuext == 0)
7779  goto L100;
7780 
7781  if(iuext < 0) {
7782 //*-*- internal parameter number specified
7783  iint = -(iuext);
7784 
7785  if(iint > fNpar)
7786  goto L100;
7787 
7788  iext = fNexofi[iint-1];
7789  iuint = iext;
7790  } else {
7791 //*-*- external parameter number specified
7792  iext = iuext;
7793 
7794  if(iext > fNu)
7795  goto L100;
7796 
7797  iint = fNiofex[iext-1];
7798  iuint = iint;
7799  }
7800 
7801 //*-*- in both cases
7802  nvl = fNvarl[iext-1];
7803 
7804  if(nvl < 0)
7805  goto L100;
7806 
7807  chnam = fCpnam[iext-1];
7808  val = fU[iext-1];
7809 
7810  if(iint > 0)
7811  err = fWerr[iint-1];
7812 
7813  if(nvl == 4) {
7814  xlolim = fAlim[iext-1];
7815  xuplim = fBlim[iext-1];
7816  }
7817 
7818  return;
7819 //*-*- parameter is undefined
7820 L100:
7821  iuint = -1;
7822  chnam = "undefined";
7823  val = 0;
7824 } /* mnpout_ */
7825 
7826 //______________________________________________________________________________
7827 void TMinuit::mnprin(int inkode, double fval) {
7828 //*-*-*-*Prints the values of the parameters at the time of the call*-*-*-*-*
7829 //*-* ===========================================================
7830 //*-* also prints other relevant information such as function value,
7831 //*-* estimated distance to minimum, parameter errors, step sizes.
7832 //*-*
7833 //*-* According to the value of IKODE, the printout is:/
7834 //*-* IKODE=INKODE= 0 only info about function value
7835 //*-* 1 parameter values, errors, limits
7836 //*-* 2 values, errors, step sizes, internal values
7837 //*-* 3 values, errors, step sizes, first derivs.
7838 //*-* 4 values, parabolic errors, MINOS errors
7839 //*-* when INKODE=5, MNPRIN chooses IKODE=1,2, or 3, according to fISW[1]
7840 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
7841 
7842  /* Initialized data */
7843 
7844  static string cblank = " ";
7845  static string cnambf = " ";
7846 
7847  /* Local variables */
7848  double dcmax, x1, x2, x3, dc;
7849  x2 = x3 = 0;
7850  int nadd, i, k, l, m, ikode, ic, nc, ntrail, lbl;
7851  string chedm;
7852  string colhdl[6], colhdu[6], cx2, cx3, cheval;
7853 
7854  if(fNu == 0) {
7855  printf(" THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PARAMETERS DEFINED\n");
7856  return;
7857  }
7858 
7859 //*-*- get value of IKODE based in INKODE, fISW[1]
7860  ikode = inkode;
7861 
7862  if(inkode == 5) {
7863  ikode = fISW[1] + 1;
7864 
7865  if(ikode > 3)
7866  ikode = 3;
7867  }
7868 
7869 //*-*- set 'default' column headings
7870  for(k = 1; k <= 6; ++k) {
7871  colhdu[k-1] = "UNDEFINED";
7872  colhdl[k-1] = "COLUMN HEAD";
7873  }
7874 
7875 //*-*- print title if Minos errors, and title exists.
7876  if(ikode == 4 && fCtitl != fCundef) {
7877  printf(" MINUIT TASK: %s\n", fCtitl.c_str());
7878  }
7879 
7880 //*-*- report function value and status
7881  if(fval == fUndefi)
7882  cheval = " unknown ";
7883  else
7884  cheval = local_Form("%g", fval).c_str();
7885 
7886  if(fEDM == fBigedm)
7887  chedm = " unknown ";
7888  else
7889  chedm = local_Form("%g", fEDM).c_str();
7890 
7891  nc = fNfcn - fNfcnfr;
7892  printf(" FCN=%s FROM %8s STATUS=%10s %6d CALLS %9d TOTAL\n"
7893  , cheval
7894  .c_str(), fCfrom
7895  .c_str(), fCstatu.c_str(), nc, fNfcn);
7896  m = fISW[1];
7897 
7898  if(m == 0 || m == 2 || fDcovar == 0) {
7899  printf(" EDM=%s STRATEGY=%2d %s"
7900  , chedm.c_str(), fIstrat
7901  , fCovmes[m].c_str());
7902  } else {
7903  dcmax = 1;
7904  dc = min(fDcovar, dcmax)*100;
7905  printf(" EDM=%s STRATEGY=%2d ERROR MATRIX UNCERTAINTY %5.1f per cent\n"
7906  , chedm.c_str(), fIstrat, dc);
7907  }
7908 
7909  if(ikode == 0)
7910  return;
7911 
7912 //*-*- find longest name (for Rene!)
7913  ntrail = 10;
7914 
7915  for(i = 1; i <= fNu; ++i) {
7916  if(fNvarl[i-1] < 0)
7917  continue;
7918 
7919  for(ic = 10; ic >= 1; --ic) {
7920  if(fCpnam[i-1][ic-1] != ' ')
7921  goto L16;
7922  }
7923 
7924  ic = 1;
7925 L16:
7926  lbl = 10 - ic;
7927 
7928  if(lbl < ntrail)
7929  ntrail = lbl;
7930  }
7931 
7932  nadd = ntrail / 2 + 1;
7933 
7934  if(ikode == 1) {
7935  colhdu[0] = " ";
7936  colhdl[0] = " ERROR ";
7937  colhdu[1] = " PHYSICAL";
7938  colhdu[2] = " LIMITS ";
7939  colhdl[1] = " NEGATIVE ";
7940  colhdl[2] = " POSITIVE ";
7941  }
7942 
7943  if(ikode == 2) {
7944  colhdu[0] = " ";
7945  colhdl[0] = " ERROR ";
7946  colhdu[1] = " INTERNAL ";
7947  colhdl[1] = " STEP SIZE ";
7948  colhdu[2] = " INTERNAL ";
7949  colhdl[2] = " VALUE ";
7950  }
7951 
7952  if(ikode == 3) {
7953  colhdu[0] = " ";
7954  colhdl[0] = " ERROR ";
7955  colhdu[1] = " STEP ";
7956  colhdl[1] = " SIZE ";
7957  colhdu[2] = " FIRST ";
7958  colhdl[2] = " DERIVATIVE ";
7959  }
7960 
7961  if(ikode == 4) {
7962  colhdu[0] = " PARABOLIC ";
7963  colhdl[0] = " ERROR ";
7964  colhdu[1] = " MINOS ";
7965  colhdu[2] = "ERRORS ";
7966  colhdl[1] = " NEGATIVE ";
7967  colhdl[2] = " POSITIVE ";
7968  }
7969 
7970  if(ikode != 4) {
7971  if(fISW[1] < 3)
7972  colhdu[0] = " APPROXIMATE ";
7973 
7974  if(fISW[1] < 1)
7975  colhdu[0] = " CURRENT GUESS";
7976  }
7977 
7978  printf(" EXT PARAMETER %-14s%-14s%-14s\n", colhdu[0].c_str(), colhdu[1].c_str(), colhdu[2].c_str());
7979  printf(" NO. NAME VALUE %-14s%-14s%-14s\n", colhdl[0].c_str(), colhdl[1].c_str(), colhdl[2].c_str());
7980 
7981 //*-*- . . . loop over parameters . .
7982  for(i = 1; i <= fNu; ++i) {
7983  if(fNvarl[i-1] < 0)
7984  continue;
7985 
7986  l = fNiofex[i-1];
7987  cnambf = cblank.substr(0, nadd) + fCpnam[i-1];
7988 
7989  if(l == 0)
7990  goto L55;
7991 
7992 //*-*- variable parameter.
7993  x1 = fWerr[l-1];
7994  cx2 = "PLEASE GET X..";
7995  cx3 = "PLEASE GET X..";
7996 
7997  if(ikode == 1) {
7998  if(fNvarl[i-1] <= 1) {
7999  printf("%4d %-11s%14.5e%14.5e\n", i, cnambf.c_str(), fU[i-1], x1);
8000  continue;
8001  } else {
8002  x2 = fAlim[i-1];
8003  x3 = fBlim[i-1];
8004  }
8005  }
8006 
8007  if(ikode == 2) {
8008  x2 = fDirin[l-1];
8009  x3 = fX[l-1];
8010  }
8011 
8012  if(ikode == 3) {
8013  x2 = fDirin[l-1];
8014  x3 = fGrd[l-1];
8015 
8016  if(fNvarl[i-1] > 1 && fabs(cos(fX[l-1])) < .001) {
8017  cx3 = "** at limit **";
8018  }
8019  }
8020 
8021  if(ikode == 4) {
8022  x2 = fErn[l-1];
8023 
8024  if(x2 == 0)
8025  cx2 = " ";
8026 
8027  if(x2 == fUndefi)
8028  cx2 = " at limit ";
8029 
8030  x3 = fErp[l-1];
8031 
8032  if(x3 == 0)
8033  cx3 = " ";
8034 
8035  if(x3 == fUndefi)
8036  cx3 = " at limit ";
8037  }
8038 
8039  if(cx2 == "PLEASE GET X..")
8040  cx2 = local_Form("%14.5e", x2).c_str();
8041 
8042  if(cx3 == "PLEASE GET X..")
8043  cx3 = local_Form("%14.5e", x3).c_str();
8044 
8045  printf("%4d %-11s%14.5e%14.5e%-14s%-14s\n", i
8046  , cnambf.c_str(), fU[i-1], x1
8047  , cx2.c_str(), cx3.c_str());
8048 
8049 //*-*- check if parameter is at limit
8050  if(fNvarl[i-1] <= 1 || ikode == 3)
8051  continue;
8052 
8053  if(fabs(cos(fX[l-1])) < .001) {
8054  printf(" WARNING - - ABOVE PARAMETER IS AT LIMIT.\n");
8055  }
8056 
8057  continue;
8058 
8059 //*-*- print constant or fixed parameter.
8060 L55:
8061  colhdu[0] = " constant ";
8062 
8063  if(fNvarl[i-1] > 0)
8064  colhdu[0] = " fixed ";
8065 
8066  if(fNvarl[i-1] == 4 && ikode == 1) {
8067  printf("%4d %-11s%14.5e%-14s%14.5e%14.5e\n", i
8068  , cnambf.c_str(), fU[i-1]
8069  , colhdu[0].c_str(), fAlim[i-1], fBlim[i-1]);
8070  } else {
8071  printf("%4d %-11s%14.5e%s\n", i
8072  , cnambf.c_str(), fU[i-1], colhdu[0].c_str());
8073  }
8074  }
8075 
8076  if(fUp != fUpdflt) {
8077  printf(" ERR DEF= %g\n", fUp);
8078  }
8079 
8080  return;
8081 } /* mnprin_ */
8082 
8083 //______________________________________________________________________________
8084 void TMinuit::mnpsdf() {
8085 //*-*-*-*-*-*Calculates the eigenvalues of v to see if positive-def*-*-*-*-*
8086 //*-* ======================================================
8087 //*-* if not, adds constant along diagonal to make positive.
8088 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8089 
8090  /* Local variables */
8091  double dgmin, padd, pmin, pmax, dg, epspdf, epsmin;
8092  int ndex, i, j, ndexd, ip, ifault;
8093  string chbuff, ctemp;
8094 
8095  epsmin = 1e-6;
8096  epspdf = max(epsmin, fEpsma2);
8097  dgmin = fVhmat[0];
8098 
8099 //*-*- Check if negative or zero on diagonal
8100  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8101  ndex = i*(i + 1) / 2;
8102 
8103  if(fVhmat[ndex-1] <= 0) {
8104  mnwarn("W", fCfrom.c_str(), local_Form("Negative diagonal element %d in Error Matrix", i).c_str());
8105  }
8106 
8107  if(fVhmat[ndex-1] < dgmin)
8108  dgmin = fVhmat[ndex-1];
8109  }
8110 
8111  if(dgmin <= 0) {
8112  dg = epspdf + 1 - dgmin;
8113  mnwarn("W", fCfrom.c_str(), local_Form("%g added to diagonal of error matrix", dg).c_str());
8114  } else {
8115  dg = 0;
8116  }
8117 
8118 //*-*- Store VHMAT in P, make sure diagonal pos.
8119  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8120  ndex = i*(i-1) / 2;
8121  ndexd = ndex + i;
8122  fVhmat[ndexd-1] += dg;
8123 
8124  if(fVhmat[ndexd-1]==0) {
8125  fPSDFs[i-1] = 1 / 1e-19; // a totally arbitrary silly small value
8126  } else {
8127  fPSDFs[i-1] = 1 / sqrt(fVhmat[ndexd-1]);
8128  }
8129 
8130  for(j = 1; j <= i; ++j) {
8131  ++ndex;
8132  fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] = fVhmat[ndex-1]*fPSDFs[i-1]*fPSDFs[j-1];
8133  }
8134  }
8135 
8136 //*-*- call eigen (p,p,maxint,npar,pstar,-npar)
8137  mneig(fP, fMaxint, fNpar, fMaxint, fPstar, epspdf, ifault);
8138  pmin = fPstar[0];
8139  pmax = fPstar[0];
8140 
8141  for(ip = 2; ip <= fNpar; ++ip) {
8142  if(fPstar[ip-1] < pmin)
8143  pmin = fPstar[ip-1];
8144 
8145  if(fPstar[ip-1] > pmax)
8146  pmax = fPstar[ip-1];
8147  }
8148 
8149  pmax = max(fabs(pmax), double(1));
8150 
8151  if((pmin <= 0 && fLwarn) || fISW[4] >= 2) {
8152  printf(" EIGENVALUES OF SECOND-DERIVATIVE MATRIX:\n");
8153  ctemp = " ";
8154 
8155  for(ip = 1; ip <= fNpar; ++ip) {
8156  ctemp += local_Form(" %11.4e", fPstar[ip-1]).c_str();
8157  }
8158 
8159  printf("%s\n", ctemp.c_str());
8160  }
8161 
8162  if(pmin > epspdf*pmax)
8163  return;
8164 
8165  if(fISW[1] == 3)
8166  fISW[1] = 2;
8167 
8168  padd = pmax*.001 - pmin;
8169 
8170  for(ip = 1; ip <= fNpar; ++ip) {
8171  ndex = ip*(ip + 1) / 2;
8172  fVhmat[ndex-1] *= padd + 1;
8173  }
8174 
8175  fCstatu = "NOT POSDEF";
8176  mnwarn("W", fCfrom.c_str(), local_Form("MATRIX FORCED POS-DEF BY ADDING %f TO DIAGONAL.", padd).c_str());
8177 
8178 } /* mnpsdf_ */
8179 
8180 //______________________________________________________________________________
8181 void TMinuit::mnrazz(double ynew, double* pnew, double* y, int& jh, int& jl) {
8182 //*-*-*-*-*Called only by MNSIMP (and MNIMPR) to add a new point*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8183 //*-* =====================================================
8184 //*-* and remove an old one from the current simplex, and get the
8185 //*-* estimated distance to minimum.
8186 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8187 
8188  /* Local variables */
8189  double pbig, plit;
8190  int i, j, nparp1;
8191 
8192  /* Function Body */
8193  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8194  fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] = pnew[i-1];
8195  }
8196 
8197  y[jh-1] = ynew;
8198 
8199  if(ynew < fAmin) {
8200  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8201  fX[i-1] = pnew[i-1];
8202  }
8203 
8204  mninex(fX);
8205  fAmin = ynew;
8206  fCstatu = "PROGRESS ";
8207  jl = jh;
8208  }
8209 
8210  jh = 1;
8211  nparp1 = fNpar + 1;
8212 
8213  for(j = 2; j <= nparp1; ++j) {
8214  if(y[j-1] > y[jh-1])
8215  jh = j;
8216  }
8217 
8218  fEDM = y[jh-1] - y[jl-1];
8219 
8220  if(fEDM <= 0)
8221  goto L45;
8222 
8223  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8224  pbig = fP[i-1];
8225  plit = pbig;
8226 
8227  for(j = 2; j <= nparp1; ++j) {
8228  if(fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] > pbig)
8229  pbig = fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
8230 
8231  if(fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] < plit)
8232  plit = fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
8233  }
8234 
8235  fDirin[i-1] = pbig - plit;
8236  }
8237 
8238 L40:
8239  return;
8240 L45:
8241  printf(" FUNCTION VALUE DOES NOT SEEM TO DEPEND ON ANY OF THE %d VARIABLE PARAMETERS.\n", fNpar);
8242  printf(" VERIFY THAT STEP SIZES ARE BIG ENOUGH AND CHECK FCN LOGIC.\n");
8243  printf(" *******************************************************************************\n");
8244  printf(" *******************************************************************************\n");
8245  goto L40;
8246 } /* mnrazz_ */
8247 
8248 //______________________________________________________________________________
8249 void TMinuit::mnrn15(double& val, int& inseed) {
8250 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*This is a super-portable random number generator*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8251 //*-* ================================================
8252 //*-* It should not overflow on any 32-bit machine.
8253 //*-* The cycle is only ~10**9, so use with care!
8254 //*-* Note especially that VAL must not be undefined on input.
8255 //*-* Set Default Starting Seed
8256 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8257 
8258  /* Initialized data */
8259 
8260  static int iseed = 12345;
8261 
8262  int k;
8263 
8264  if(val == 3)
8265  goto L100;
8266 
8267  inseed = iseed;
8268  k = iseed / 53668;
8269  iseed = (iseed - k*53668)*40014 - k*12211;
8270 
8271  if(iseed < 0)
8272  iseed += 2147483563;
8273 
8274  val = double(iseed*4.656613e-10);
8275  return;
8276 //*-* "entry" to set seed, flag is VAL=3
8277 L100:
8278  iseed = inseed;
8279 } /* mnrn15_ */
8280 
8281 //______________________________________________________________________________
8282 void TMinuit::mnrset(int iopt) {
8283 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Resets function value and errors to UNDEFINED*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8284 //*-* =============================================
8285 //*-* If IOPT=1,
8286 //*-* If IOPT=0, sets only MINOS errors to undefined
8287 //*-* Called from MNCLER and whenever problem changes, for example
8288 //*-* after SET LIMITS, SET PARAM, CALL FCN 6
8289 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8290 
8291  int iext, i;
8292 
8293  fCstatu = "RESET ";
8294 
8295  if(iopt >= 1) {
8296  fAmin = fUndefi;
8297  fFval3 = fabs(fAmin)*2 + 1;
8298  fEDM = fBigedm;
8299  fISW[3] = 0;
8300  fISW[1] = 0;
8301  fDcovar = 1;
8302  fISW[0] = 0;
8303  }
8304 
8305  fLnolim = true;
8306 
8307  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8308  iext = fNexofi[i-1];
8309 
8310  if(fNvarl[iext-1] >= 4)
8311  fLnolim = false;
8312 
8313  fErp[i-1] = 0;
8314  fErn[i-1] = 0;
8315  fGlobcc[i-1] = 0;
8316  }
8317 
8318  if(fISW[1] >= 1) {
8319  fISW[1] = 1;
8320  fDcovar = max(fDcovar, .5);
8321  }
8322 } /* mnrset_ */
8323 
8324 //______________________________________________________________________________
8325 void TMinuit::mnsave() {
8326 //*-*-*-*Writes current parameter values and step sizes onto file ISYSSA*-*-*
8327 //*-* ===============================================================
8328 //*-* in format which can be reread by Minuit for restarting.
8329 //*-* The covariance matrix is also output if it exists.
8330 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8331 
8332  printf("mnsave is dummy in TMinuit\n");
8333 
8334 } /* mnsave_ */
8335 
8336 //______________________________________________________________________________
8337 void TMinuit::mnscan() {
8338 //*-*-*-*-*Scans the values of FCN as a function of one parameter*-*-*-*-*-*
8339 //*-* ======================================================
8340 //*-* and plots the resulting values as a curve using MNPLOT.
8341 //*-* It may be called to scan one parameter or all parameters.
8342 //*-* retains the best function and parameter values found.
8343 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8344 
8345  /* Local variables */
8346  double step, uhigh, xhreq, xlreq, ubest, fnext, unext, xh, xl;
8347  int ipar, iint, icall, ncall, nbins, nparx;
8348  int nxypt, nccall, iparwd;
8349 
8350  xlreq = min(fWord7[2], fWord7[3]);
8351  xhreq = max(fWord7[2], fWord7[3]);
8352  ncall = int((fWord7[1] + .01));
8353 
8354  if(ncall <= 1)
8355  ncall = 41;
8356 
8357  if(ncall > 98)
8358  ncall = 98;
8359 
8360  nccall = ncall;
8361 
8362  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
8363  mnamin();
8364 
8365  iparwd = int((fWord7[0] + .1));
8366  ipar = max(iparwd, 0);
8367  fCstatu = "NO CHANGE";
8368 
8369  if(iparwd > 0)
8370  goto L200;
8371 
8372 //*-*- equivalent to a loop over parameters requested
8373 L100:
8374  ++ipar;
8375 
8376  if(ipar > fNu)
8377  goto L900;
8378 
8379  iint = fNiofex[ipar-1];
8380 
8381  if(iint <= 0)
8382  goto L100;
8383 
8384 //*-*- set up range for parameter IPAR
8385 L200:
8386  iint = fNiofex[ipar-1];
8387  ubest = fU[ipar-1];
8388  fXpt[0] = ubest;
8389  fYpt[0] = fAmin;
8390  fChpt[0] = ' ';
8391  fXpt[1] = ubest;
8392  fYpt[1] = fAmin;
8393  fChpt[1] = 'X';
8394  nxypt = 2;
8395 
8396  if(fNvarl[ipar-1] > 1)
8397  goto L300;
8398 
8399 //*-*- no limits on parameter
8400  if(xlreq == xhreq)
8401  goto L250;
8402 
8403  unext = xlreq;
8404  step = (xhreq - xlreq) / double(ncall-1);
8405  goto L500;
8406 L250:
8407  xl = ubest - fWerr[iint-1];
8408  xh = ubest + fWerr[iint-1];
8409  mnbins(xl, xh, ncall, unext, uhigh, nbins, step);
8410  nccall = nbins + 1;
8411  goto L500;
8412 //*-*- limits on parameter
8413 L300:
8414 
8415  if(xlreq == xhreq)
8416  goto L350;
8417 
8418 //*-* Computing MAX
8419  xl = max(xlreq, fAlim[ipar-1]);
8420 //*-* Computing MIN
8421  xh = min(xhreq, fBlim[ipar-1]);
8422 
8423  if(xl >= xh)
8424  goto L700;
8425 
8426  unext = xl;
8427  step = (xh - xl) / double(ncall-1);
8428  goto L500;
8429 L350:
8430  unext = fAlim[ipar-1];
8431  step = (fBlim[ipar-1] - fAlim[ipar-1]) / double(ncall-1);
8432 //*-*- main scanning loop over parameter IPAR
8433 L500:
8434 
8435  for(icall = 1; icall <= nccall; ++icall) {
8436  fU[ipar-1] = unext;
8437  nparx = fNpar;
8438  Eval(nparx, fGin, fnext, fU, 4);
8439  ++fNfcn;
8440  ++nxypt;
8441  fXpt[nxypt-1] = unext;
8442  fYpt[nxypt-1] = fnext;
8443  fChpt[nxypt-1] = '*';
8444 
8445  if(fnext < fAmin) {
8446  fAmin = fnext;
8447  ubest = unext;
8448  fCstatu = "IMPROVED ";
8449  }
8450 
8451  unext += step;
8452  }
8453 
8454  fChpt[nccall] = 0;
8455 
8456 //*-*- finished with scan of parameter IPAR
8457  fU[ipar-1] = ubest;
8458  mnexin(fX);
8459 
8460  if(fISW[4] >= 1)
8461  printf("%dSCAN OF PARAMETER NO. %d, %s"
8462  , fNewpag, ipar, fCpnam[ipar-1].c_str());
8463 
8464  mnplot(fXpt, fYpt, fChpt, nxypt, fNpagwd, fNpagln);
8465  goto L800;
8466 L700:
8467  printf(" REQUESTED RANGE OUTSIDE LIMITS FOR PARAMETER %d\n", ipar);
8468 L800:
8469 
8470  if(iparwd <= 0)
8471  goto L100;
8472 
8473 //*-*- finished with all parameters
8474 L900:
8475 
8476  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
8477  mnprin(5, fAmin);
8478 } /* mnscan_ */
8479 
8480 //______________________________________________________________________________
8481 void TMinuit::mnseek() {
8482 //*-*-*-*Performs a rough (but global) minimization by monte carlo search*-*
8483 //*-* ================================================================
8484 //*-* Each time a new minimum is found, the search area is shifted
8485 //*-* to be centered at the best value. Random points are chosen
8486 //*-* uniformly over a hypercube determined by current step sizes.
8487 //*-* The Metropolis algorithm accepts a worse point with probability
8488 //*-* exp(-d/UP), where d is the degradation. Improved points
8489 //*-* are of course always accepted. Actual steps are random
8490 //*-* multiples of the nominal steps (DIRIN).
8491 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8492 
8493  /* Local variables */
8494  double dxdi, rnum, ftry, rnum1, rnum2, alpha;
8495  double flast, bar;
8496  int ipar, iext, j, ifail, iseed=0, nparx, istep, ib, mxfail, mxstep;
8497 
8498  mxfail = int(fWord7[0]);
8499 
8500  if(mxfail <= 0)
8501  mxfail = fNpar*20 + 100;
8502 
8503  mxstep = mxfail*10;
8504 
8505  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
8506  mnamin();
8507 
8508  alpha = fWord7[1];
8509 
8510  if(alpha <= 0)
8511  alpha = 3;
8512 
8513  if(fISW[4] >= 1) {
8514  printf(" MNSEEK: MONTE CARLO MINIMIZATION USING METROPOLIS ALGORITHM\n");
8515  printf(" TO STOP AFTER %6d SUCCESSIVE FAILURES, OR %7d STEPS\n", mxfail, mxstep);
8516  printf(" MAXIMUM STEP SIZE IS %9.3f ERROR BARS.\n", alpha);
8517  }
8518 
8519  fCstatu = "INITIAL ";
8520 
8521  if(fISW[4] >= 2)
8522  mnprin(2, fAmin);
8523 
8524  fCstatu = "UNCHANGED ";
8525  ifail = 0;
8526  rnum = 0;
8527  rnum1 = 0;
8528  rnum2 = 0;
8529  nparx = fNpar;
8530  flast = fAmin;
8531 
8532 //*-*- set up step sizes, starting values
8533  for(ipar = 1; ipar <= fNpar; ++ipar) {
8534  iext = fNexofi[ipar-1];
8535  fDirin[ipar-1] = alpha*2*fWerr[ipar-1];
8536 
8537  if(fNvarl[iext-1] > 1) {
8538 //*-*- parameter with limits
8539  mndxdi(fX[ipar-1], ipar-1, dxdi);
8540 
8541  if(dxdi == 0)
8542  dxdi = 1;
8543 
8544  fDirin[ipar-1] = alpha*2*fWerr[ipar-1] / dxdi;
8545 
8546  if(fabs(fDirin[ipar-1]) > 6.2831859999999997) {
8547  fDirin[ipar-1] = 6.2831859999999997;
8548  }
8549  }
8550 
8551  fSEEKxmid[ipar-1] = fX[ipar-1];
8552  fSEEKxbest[ipar-1] = fX[ipar-1];
8553  }
8554 
8555 //*-*- search loop
8556  for(istep = 1; istep <= mxstep; ++istep) {
8557  if(ifail >= mxfail)
8558  break;
8559 
8560  for(ipar = 1; ipar <= fNpar; ++ipar) {
8561  mnrn15(rnum1, iseed);
8562  mnrn15(rnum2, iseed);
8563  fX[ipar-1] = fSEEKxmid[ipar-1] + (rnum1 + rnum2 - 1)*.5*fDirin[ipar-1];
8564  }
8565 
8566  mninex(fX);
8567  Eval(nparx, fGin, ftry, fU, 4);
8568  ++fNfcn;
8569 
8570  if(ftry < flast) {
8571  if(ftry < fAmin) {
8572  fCstatu = "IMPROVEMNT";
8573  fAmin = ftry;
8574 
8575  for(ib = 1; ib <= fNpar; ++ib) {
8576  fSEEKxbest[ib-1] = fX[ib-1];
8577  }
8578 
8579  ifail = 0;
8580 
8581  if(fISW[4] >= 2)
8582  mnprin(2, fAmin);
8583  }
8584 
8585  goto L300;
8586  } else {
8587  ++ifail;
8588 //*-*- Metropolis algorithm
8589  bar = (fAmin - ftry) / fUp;
8590  mnrn15(rnum, iseed);
8591 
8592  if(bar < log(rnum))
8593  continue;
8594  }
8595 
8596 //*-*- Accept new point, move there
8597 L300:
8598 
8599  for(j = 1; j <= fNpar; ++j) {
8600  fSEEKxmid[j-1] = fX[j-1];
8601  }
8602 
8603  flast = ftry;
8604  }
8605 
8606 //*-*- end search loop
8607  if(fISW[4] > 1) {
8608  printf(" MNSEEK: %5d SUCCESSIVE UNSUCCESSFUL TRIALS.\n", ifail);
8609  }
8610
