8611  for(ib = 1; ib <= fNpar; ++ib) {
8612  fX[ib-1] = fSEEKxbest[ib-1];
8613  }
8614 
8615  mninex(fX);
8616 
8617  if(fISW[4] >= 1)
8618  mnprin(2, fAmin);
8619 
8620  if(fISW[4] == 0)
8621  mnprin(0, fAmin);
8622 } /* mnseek_ */
8623 
8624 //______________________________________________________________________________
8625 void TMinuit::mnset() {
8626 //*-*-*-*-*Interprets the commands that start with SET and SHOW*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8627 //*-* ====================================================
8628 //*-* Called from MNEXCM
8629 //*-* file characteristics for SET INPUT
8630 //*-* 'SET ' or 'SHOW', 'ON ' or 'OFF', 'SUPPRESSED' or 'REPORTED '
8631 //*-* explanation of print level numbers -1:3 and strategies 0:2
8632 //*-* identification of debug options
8633 //*-* things that can be set or shown
8634 //*-* options not intended for normal users
8635 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
8636 
8637  /* Initialized data */
8638 
8639  const char* cname[30] = {
8640  "FCN value ",
8641  "PARameters",
8642  "LIMits ",
8643  "COVariance",
8644  "CORrelatio",
8645  "PRInt levl",
8646  "NOGradient",
8647  "GRAdient ",
8648  "ERRor def ",
8649  "INPut file",
8650  "WIDth page",
8651  "LINes page",
8652  "NOWarnings",
8653  "WARnings ",
8654  "RANdom gen",
8655  "TITle ",
8656  "STRategy ",
8657  "EIGenvalue",
8658  "PAGe throw",
8659  "MINos errs",
8660  "EPSmachine",
8661  "OUTputfile",
8662  "BATch ",
8663  "INTeractiv",
8664  "VERsion ",
8665  "reserve ",
8666  "NODebug ",
8667  "DEBug ",
8668  "SHOw ",
8669  "SET "
8670  };
8671 
8672  static int nname = 25;
8673  static int nntot = 30;
8674  static string cprlev[5] = {
8675  "-1: NO OUTPUT EXCEPT FROM SHOW ",
8676  " 0: REDUCED OUTPUT ",
8677  " 1: NORMAL OUTPUT ",
8678  " 2: EXTRA OUTPUT FOR PROBLEM CASES",
8679  " 3: MAXIMUM OUTPUT "
8680  };
8681 
8682  static string cstrat[3] = {
8683  " 0: MINIMIZE THE NUMBER OF CALLS TO FUNCTION",
8684  " 1: TRY TO BALANCE SPEED AGAINST RELIABILITY",
8685  " 2: MAKE SURE MINIMUM TRUE, ERRORS CORRECT "
8686  };
8687 
8688  static string cdbopt[7] = {
8689  "REPORT ALL EXCEPTIONAL CONDITIONS ",
8690  "MNLINE: LINE SEARCH MINIMIZATION ",
8691  "MNDERI: FIRST DERIVATIVE CALCULATIONS ",
8692  "MNHESS: SECOND DERIVATIVE CALCULATIONS ",
8693  "MNMIGR: COVARIANCE MATRIX UPDATES ",
8694  "MNHES1: FIRST DERIVATIVE UNCERTAINTIES ",
8695  "MNCONT: MNCONTOUR PLOT (MNCROS SEARCH) "
8696  };
8697 
8698  /* System generated locals */
8699  int f_inqu();
8700 
8701  /* Local variables */
8702  double val;
8703  int iset, iprm, i, jseed, kname, iseed, iunit, id, ii, kk;
8704  int ikseed, idbopt, igrain=0, iswsav, isw2;
8705  string cfname, cmode, ckind, cwarn, copt, ctemp, ctemp2;
8706  bool lname=false;
8707 
8708  for(i = 1; i <= nntot; ++i) {
8709  ctemp = cname[i-1];
8710  ckind = ctemp.substr(0, 3);
8711  ctemp2 = fCword.substr(4, 6);
8712 
8713  if(strstr(ctemp2.c_str(), ckind.c_str()))
8714  goto L5;
8715  }
8716 
8717  i = 0;
8718 L5:
8719  kname = i;
8720 
8721 //*-*- Command could be SET xxx, SHOW xxx, HELP SET or HELP SHOW
8722  ctemp2 = fCword.substr(0, 3);
8723 
8724  if(contains(ctemp2, "HEL"))
8725  goto L2000;
8726 
8727  if(contains(ctemp2, "SHO"))
8728  goto L1000;
8729 
8730  if(!contains(ctemp2, "SET"))
8731  goto L1900;
8732 
8733 //*-*- ---
8734  ckind = "SET ";
8735 
8736 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set unknown
8737  if(kname <= 0)
8738  goto L1900;
8739 
8740 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set known
8741  switch((int)kname) {
8742  case 1:
8743  goto L3000;
8744 
8745  case 2:
8746  goto L20;
8747 
8748  case 3:
8749  goto L30;
8750 
8751  case 4:
8752  goto L40;
8753 
8754  case 5:
8755  goto L3000;
8756

8759

8768

8770  goto L100;
8771 
8772  case 11:

8774

8776  goto L120;
8777 
8778  case 13:
8779  goto L130;
8780

8783

8785  goto L150;
8786 
8787  case 16:
8788  goto L160;
8789

8791  goto L170;
8792 
8793  case 18:
8794  goto L3000;
8795 
8796  case 19:
8797  goto L190;
8798 
8799  case 20:
8800  goto L3000;
8801 
8802  case 21:
8803  goto L210;
8804 
8805  case 22:
8806  goto L220;
8807 
8808  case 23:
8809  goto L230;
8810 
8811  case 24:
8812  goto L240;
8813 
8814  case 25:
8815  goto L3000;
8816 
8817  case 26:
8818  goto L1900;
8819 
8820  case 27:
8821  goto L270;
8822 
8823  case 28:
8824  goto L280;
8825 
8826  case 29:
8827  goto L290;
8828 
8829  case 30:
8830  goto L300;
8831  }
8832 
8833 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set param
8834 L20:
8835  iprm = int(fWord7[0]);
8836 
8837  if(iprm > fNu)
8838  goto L25;
8839 
8840  if(iprm <= 0)
8841  goto L25;
8842 
8843  if(fNvarl[iprm-1] < 0)
8844  goto L25;
8845 
8846  fU[iprm-1] = fWord7[1];
8847  mnexin(fX);
8848  isw2 = fISW[1];
8849  mnrset(1);
8850 //*-*- Keep approximate covariance matrix, even if new param value
8851  fISW[1] = min(isw2, 1);
8852  fCfrom = "SET PARM";
8853  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
8854  fCstatu = "NEW VALUES";
8855  return;
8856 L25:
8857  printf(" UNDEFINED PARAMETER NUMBER. IGNORED.\n");
8858  return;
8859 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set limits
8860 L30:
8861  mnlims();
8862  return;
8863 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set covar
8864 L40:

8866  goto L3000;
8867 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set print
8868 L60:
8869  fISW[4] = int(fWord7[0]);
8870  return;
8871 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set nograd
8872 L70:
8873  fISW[2] = 0;
8874  return;
8875 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set grad
8876 L80:
8877  mngrad();
8878  return;
8879 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set errdef
8880 L90:
8881 
8882  if(fWord7[0] == fUp)
8883  return;
8884 
8885  if(fWord7[0] <= 0) {
8886  if(fUp == fUpdflt)
8887  return;
8888 
8889  fUp = fUpdflt;
8890  } else {
8891  fUp = fWord7[0];
8892  }
8893 
8894  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
8895  fErn[i-1] = 0;
8896  fErp[i-1] = 0;
8897  }
8898 
8899  mnwerr();
8900  return;
8901 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set input
8902 //*-* This command must be handled by MNREAD. If it gets this far,
8903 //*-*- it is illegal.
8904 L100:
8905  goto L3000;
8906 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set width
8907 L110:
8908  fNpagwd = int(fWord7[0]);
8909  fNpagwd = max(fNpagwd, 50);
8910  return;
8911 
8912 L120:
8913  fNpagln = int(fWord7[0]);
8914  return;
8915 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set nowarn
8916 
8917 L130:
8918  fLwarn = false;
8919  return;
8920 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set warn
8921 L140:
8922  fLwarn = true;
8923  mnwarn("W", "SHO", "SHO");
8924  return;
8925 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set random
8926 L150:
8927  jseed = int(fWord7[0]);
8928  val = 3;
8929  mnrn15(val, jseed);
8930 
8931  if(fISW[4] > 0) {
8932  printf(" MINUIT RANDOM NUMBER SEED SET TO %d\n", jseed);
8933  }
8934 
8935  return;
8936 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set title
8937 L160:
8938 //*-* this command must be handled by MNREAD, and is not Fortran-callable
8939  goto L3000;
8940 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . set strategy
8941 L170:
8942  fIstrat = int(fWord7[0]);
8943  fIstrat = max(fIstrat, 0);
8944  fIstrat = min(fIstrat, 2);
8945 
8946  if(fISW[4] > 0)
8947  goto L1172;
8948 
8949  return;
8950 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . set page throw
8951 L190:
8952  fNewpag = int(fWord7[0]);
8953  goto L1190;
8954 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set epsmac
8955 L210:
8956 
8957  if(fWord7[0] > 0 && fWord7[0] < .1) {
8958  fEpsmac = fWord7[0];
8959  }
8960 
8961  fEpsma2 = sqrt(fEpsmac);
8962  goto L1210;
8963 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set outputfile
8964 L220:
8965  iunit = int(fWord7[0]);
8966  fIsyswr = iunit;
8967  fIstkwr[0] = iunit;
8968 
8969  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
8970  goto L1220;
8971 
8972  return;
8973 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set batch
8974 L230:
8975  fISW[5] = 0;
8976 
8977  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
8978  goto L1100;
8979 
8980  return;
8981 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set interactive
8982 L240:
8983  fISW[5] = 1;
8984 
8985  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
8986  goto L1100;
8987 
8988  return;
8989 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set nodebug
8990 L270:
8991  iset = 0;
8992  goto L281;
8993 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set debug
8994 L280:
8995  iset = 1;
8996 L281:
8997  idbopt = int(fWord7[0]);
8998 
8999  if(idbopt > 6)
9000  goto L288;
9001 
9002  if(idbopt >= 0) {
9003  fIdbg[idbopt] = iset;
9004 
9005  if(iset == 1)
9006  fIdbg[0] = 1;
9007  } else {
9008 //*-*- SET DEBUG -1 sets all debug options
9009  for(id = 0; id <= 6; ++id) {
9010  fIdbg[id] = iset;
9011  }
9012  }
9013 
9014  fLrepor = fIdbg[0] >= 1;
9015  mnwarn("D", "SHO", "SHO");
9016  return;
9017 L288:
9018  printf(" UNKNOWN DEBUG OPTION %d REQUESTED. IGNORED\n", idbopt);
9019  return;
9020 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set show
9021 L290:
9022 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . set set
9023 L300:
9024  goto L3000;
9025 //*-*- -----------------------------------------------------
9026 L1000:
9027 //*-*- at this point, CWORD must be 'SHOW'
9028  ckind = "SHOW";
9029 
9030  if(kname <= 0)
9031  goto L1900;
9032 
9033  switch((int)kname) {
9034  case 1:
9035  goto L1010;
9036 
9037  case 2:
9038  goto L1020;
9039

9041  goto L1030;

9119  goto L1290;
9120

9123  }
9124 
9125 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show fcn
9126 L1010:
9127 
9128  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
9129  mnamin();
9130 
9131  mnprin(0, fAmin);
9132  return;
9133 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show param
9134 L1020:
9135

9137  mnamin();
9138 
9139  mnprin(5, fAmin);
9140  return;
9141 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show limits
9142 L1030:
9143 
9144  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
9145  mnamin();
9146 
9147  mnprin(1, fAmin);
9148  return;
9149 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show covar
9150 L1040:
9151  mnmatu(1);
9152  return;
9153 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show corre
9154 L1050:
9155  mnmatu(0);
9156  return;
9157 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show print
9158 L1060:
9159 
9160  if(fISW[4] < -1)
9161  fISW[4] = -1;
9162 
9163  if(fISW[4] > 3)
9164  fISW[4] = 3;
9165 
9166  printf(" ALLOWED PRINT LEVELS ARE:\n");
9167  printf(" %s\n", cprlev[0].c_str());
9168  printf(" %s\n", cprlev[1].c_str());
9169  printf(" %s\n", cprlev[2].c_str());
9170  printf(" %s\n", cprlev[3].c_str());
9171  printf(" %s\n", cprlev[4].c_str());
9172  printf(" CURRENT PRINTOUT LEVEL IS %s\n", cprlev[fISW[4]+1].c_str());
9173  return;
9174 //*-*- . . . . . . . show nograd, grad
9175 L1070:
9176 
9177  if(fISW[2] <= 0) {
9178  printf(" NOGRAD IS SET. DERIVATIVES NOT COMPUTED IN FCN.\n");
9179  } else {
9180  printf(" GRAD IS SET. USER COMPUTES DERIVATIVES IN FCN.\n");
9181  }
9182 
9183  return;
9184 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show errdef
9185 L1090:
9186  printf(" ERRORS CORRESPOND TO FUNCTION CHANGE OF %g\n", fUp);
9187  return;
9188 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show input,
9189 //*-*- batch, or interactive
9190 L1100:
9191 // ioin__1.inerr = 0;
9192 // ioin__1.inunit = fIsysrd;

9194 // ioin__1.inex = 0;

9203 // ioin__1.infmt = 0;
9204 // ioin__1.inform = 0;
9205 // ioin__1.inunf = 0;
9206 // ioin__1.inrecl = 0;
9207 // ioin__1.innrec = 0;
9208 // ioin__1.inblank = 0;
9209 // f_inqu(&ioin__1);
9210  cmode = "BATCH MODE ";
9211 
9212  if(fISW[5] == 1)
9213  cmode = "INTERACTIVE MODE";
9214 
9215  if(! lname)
9216  cfname = "unknown";
9217 
9218  printf(" INPUT NOW BEING READ IN %s FROM UNIT NO. %d FILENAME: %s"
9219  , cmode.c_str(), fIsysrd, cfname.c_str());
9220  return;
9221 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show width
9222 L1110:
9223  printf(" PAGE WIDTH IS SET TO %d COLUMNS\n", fNpagwd);
9224  return;
9225 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show lines
9226 L1120:
9227  printf(" PAGE LENGTH IS SET TO %d LINES\n", fNpagln);
9228  return;
9229 //*-*- . . . . . . .show nowarn, warn
9230 L1130:
9231  cwarn = "SUPPRESSED";
9232 
9233  if(fLwarn)
9234  cwarn = "REPORTED ";
9235 
9236  printf("%s\n", cwarn.c_str());
9237 
9238  if(! fLwarn)
9239  mnwarn("W", "SHO", "SHO");
9240 
9241  return;
9242 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show random
9243 L1150:
9244  val = 0;
9245  mnrn15(val, igrain);
9246  ikseed = igrain;
9247  printf(" MINUIT RNDM SEED IS CURRENTLY=%d\n", ikseed);
9248  val = 3;
9249  iseed = ikseed;
9250  mnrn15(val, iseed);
9251  return;
9252 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . show title
9253 L1160:
9254  printf(" TITLE OF CURRENT TASK IS:%s\n", fCtitl.c_str());
9255  return;
9256 //*-*- . . . . . . . show strategy
9257 L1170:
9258  printf(" ALLOWED STRATEGIES ARE:\n");
9259  printf(" %s\n", cstrat[0].c_str());
9260  printf(" %s\n", cstrat[1].c_str());
9261  printf(" %s\n", cstrat[2].c_str());
9262 L1172:
9263  printf(" NOW USING STRATEGY %s\n", cstrat[fIstrat].c_str());
9264  return;
9265 //*-*- . . . . . show eigenvalues
9266 L1180:
9267  iswsav = fISW[4];
9268  fISW[4] = 3;
9269 
9270  if(fISW[1] < 1) {
9271  printf("%s\n", fCovmes[0].c_str());
9272  } else {
9273  mnpsdf();
9274  }
9275 
9276  fISW[4] = iswsav;
9277  return;
9278 //*-*- . . . . . show page throw
9279 L1190:
9280  printf(" PAGE THROW CARRIAGE CONTROL = %d\n", fNewpag);
9281 
9282  if(fNewpag == 0) {
9283  printf(" NO PAGE THROWS IN MINUIT OUTPUT\n");
9284  }
9285 
9286  return;
9287 //*-*- . . . . . . show minos errors
9288 L1200:
9289 
9290  for(ii = 1; ii <= fNpar; ++ii) {
9291  if(fErp[ii-1] > 0 || fErn[ii-1] < 0)
9292  goto L1204;
9293  }
9294 
9295  printf(" THERE ARE NO MINOS ERRORS CURRENTLY VALID.\n");
9296  return;
9297 L1204:
9298  mnprin(4, fAmin);
9299  return;
9300 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . show epsmac
9301 L1210:
9302  printf(" FLOATING-POINT NUMBERS ASSUMED ACCURATE TO %g\n", fEpsmac);
9303  return;
9304 //*-*- . . . . . . show outputfiles
9305 L1220:
9306  printf(" MINUIT PRIMARY OUTPUT TO UNIT %d\n", fIsyswr);
9307  return;
9308 //*-*- . . . . . . show version
9309 L1250:
9310  printf(" THIS IS MINUIT VERSION:%s\n", fCvrsn.c_str());
9311  return;
9312 //*-*- . . . . . . show nodebug, debug
9313 L1270:
9314 
9315  for(id = 0; id <= 6; ++id) {
9316  copt = "OFF";
9317 
9318  if(fIdbg[id] >= 1)
9319  copt = "ON ";
9320 
9321  printf(" DEBUG OPTION %3d IS %3s :%s"
9322  , id, copt.c_str(), cdbopt[id].c_str());
9323  }
9324 
9325  if(! fLrepor)
9326  mnwarn("D", "SHO", "SHO");
9327 
9328  return;
9329 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show show
9330 L1290:
9331  ckind = "SHOW";
9332  goto L2100;
9333 //*-*- . . . . . . . . . . show set
9334 L1300:
9335  ckind = "SET ";
9336  goto L2100;
9337 //*-*- -----------------------------------------------------
9338 //*-*- UNKNOWN COMMAND
9339 L1900:
9340  printf(" THE COMMAND:%10s IS UNKNOWN.\n", fCword.c_str());
9341  goto L2100;
9342 //*-*- -----------------------------------------------------
9343 //*-*- HELP SHOW, HELP SET, SHOW SET, or SHOW SHOW
9344 L2000:
9345  ckind = "SET ";
9346  ctemp2 = fCword.substr(3, 7);
9347 
9348  if(strcmp(ctemp2.c_str(), "SHO"))
9349  ckind = "SHOW";
9350 
9351 L2100:
9352  printf(" THE FORMAT OF THE %4s COMMAND IS:\n", ckind.c_str());
9353  printf(" %s xxx [numerical arguments if any]\n", ckind.c_str());
9354  printf(" WHERE xxx MAY BE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING:\n");
9355 
9356  for(kk = 1; kk <= nname; ++kk) {
9357  printf(" %s\n", cname[kk-1]);
9358  }
9359 
9360  return;
9361 //*-*- -----------------------------------------------------
9362 //*-*- ILLEGAL COMMAND
9363 L3000:
9364  printf(" ABOVE COMMAND IS ILLEGAL. IGNORED\n");
9365 
9366 } /* mnset_ */
9367 
9368 //______________________________________________________________________________
9369 void TMinuit::mnsimp() {
9370 //*-*-*-*-*Minimization using the simplex method of Nelder and Mead*-*-*-*-*
9371 //*-* ========================================================
9372 //*-* Performs a minimization using the simplex method of Nelder
9373 //*-* and Mead (ref. -- Comp. J. 7,308 (1965)).
9374 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9375 
9376  /* Initialized data */
9377 
9378  static double alpha = 1;
9379  static double beta = .5;
9380  static double gamma = 2;
9381  static double rhomin = 4;
9382  static double rhomax = 8;
9383 
9384  /* Local variables */
9385  double dmin_, dxdi, yrho, f, ynpp1, aming, ypbar;
9386  double bestx, ystar, y1, y2, ystst, pb, wg;
9387  double absmin, rho, sig2, rho1, rho2;
9388  int npfn, i, j, k, jhold, ncycl, nparx;
9389  int nparp1, kg, jh, nf, jl, ns;
9390 
9391  if(fNpar <= 0)
9392  return;
9393 
9394  if(fAmin == fUndefi)
9395  mnamin();
9396 
9397  fCfrom = "SIMPLEX ";
9398  fNfcnfr = fNfcn;
9399  fCstatu = "UNCHANGED ";
9400  npfn = fNfcn;
9401  nparp1 = fNpar + 1;
9402  nparx = fNpar;
9403  rho1 = alpha + 1;
9404  rho2 = rho1 + alpha*gamma;
9405  wg = 1 / double(fNpar);
9406 
9407  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
9408  printf(" START SIMPLEX MINIMIZATION. CONVERGENCE WHEN EDM .LT. %g\n", fEpsi);
9409  }
9410 
9411  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9412  fDirin[i-1] = fWerr[i-1];
9413  mndxdi(fX[i-1], i-1, dxdi);
9414 
9415  if(dxdi != 0)
9416  fDirin[i-1] = fWerr[i-1] / dxdi;
9417 
9418  dmin_ = fEpsma2*fabs(fX[i-1]);
9419 
9420  if(fDirin[i-1] < dmin_)
9421  fDirin[i-1] = dmin_;
9422  }
9423 
9424 //*-* ** choose the initial simplex using single-parameter searches
9425 L1:
9426  ynpp1 = fAmin;
9427  jl = nparp1;
9428  fSIMPy[nparp1-1] = fAmin;
9429  absmin = fAmin;
9430 
9431  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9432  aming = fAmin;
9433  fPbar[i-1] = fX[i-1];
9434  bestx = fX[i-1];
9435  kg = 0;
9436  ns = 0;
9437  nf = 0;
9438 L4:
9439  fX[i-1] = bestx + fDirin[i-1];
9440  mninex(fX);
9441  Eval(nparx, fGin, f, fU, 4);
9442  ++fNfcn;
9443 
9444  if(f <= aming)
9445  goto L6;
9446 
9447 //*-*- failure
9448  if(kg == 1)
9449  goto L8;
9450 
9451  kg = -1;
9452  ++nf;
9453  fDirin[i-1] *= -.4;
9454 
9455  if(nf < 3)
9456  goto L4;
9457 
9458  ns = 6;
9459 //*-*- success
9460 L6:
9461  bestx = fX[i-1];
9462  fDirin[i-1] *= 3;
9463  aming = f;
9464  fCstatu = "PROGRESS ";
9465  kg = 1;
9466  ++ns;
9467 
9468  if(ns < 6)
9469  goto L4;
9470 
9471 //*-*- local minimum found in ith direction
9472 L8:
9473  fSIMPy[i-1] = aming;
9474 
9475  if(aming < absmin)
9476  jl = i;
9477 
9478  if(aming < absmin)
9479  absmin = aming;
9480 
9481  fX[i-1] = bestx;
9482 
9483  for(k = 1; k <= fNpar; ++k) {
9484  fP[k + i*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] = fX[k-1];
9485  }
9486  }
9487 
9488  jh = nparp1;
9489  fAmin = fSIMPy[jl-1];
9490  mnrazz(ynpp1, fPbar, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9491 
9492  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9493  fX[i-1] = fP[i + jl*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9494  }
9495 
9496  mninex(fX);
9497  fCstatu = "PROGRESS ";
9498 
9499  if(fISW[4] >= 1)
9500  mnprin(5, fAmin);
9501 
9502  fEDM = fBigedm;
9503  sig2 = fEDM;
9504  ncycl = 0;
9505 //*-*- . . . . . start main loop
9506 L50:
9507 
9508  if(sig2 < fEpsi && fEDM < fEpsi)
9509  goto L76;
9510 
9511  sig2 = fEDM;
9512 
9513  if(fNfcn - npfn > fNfcnmx)
9514  goto L78;
9515 
9516 //*-*- calculate new point * by reflection
9517  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9518  pb = 0;
9519 
9520  for(j = 1; j <= nparp1; ++j) {
9521  pb += wg*fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9522  }
9523 
9524  fPbar[i-1] = pb - wg*fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9525  fPstar[i-1] = (alpha + 1)*fPbar[i-1] - alpha*fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9526  }
9527 
9528  mninex(fPstar);
9529  Eval(nparx, fGin, ystar, fU, 4);
9530  ++fNfcn;
9531 
9532  if(ystar >= fAmin)
9533  goto L70;
9534 
9535 //*-*- point * better than jl, calculate new point **
9536  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9537  fPstst[i-1] = gamma*fPstar[i-1] + (1 - gamma)*fPbar[i-1];
9538  }
9539 
9540  mninex(fPstst);
9541  Eval(nparx, fGin, ystst, fU, 4);
9542  ++fNfcn;
9543 //*-*- try a parabola through ph, pstar, pstst. min = prho
9544  y1 = (ystar - fSIMPy[jh-1])*rho2;
9545  y2 = (ystst - fSIMPy[jh-1])*rho1;
9546  rho = (rho2*y1 - rho1*y2)*.5 / (y1 - y2);
9547 
9548  if(rho < rhomin)
9549  goto L66;
9550 
9551  if(rho > rhomax)
9552  rho = rhomax;
9553 
9554  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9555  fPrho[i-1] = rho*fPbar[i-1] + (1 - rho)*fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9556  }
9557 
9558  mninex(fPrho);
9559  Eval(nparx, fGin, yrho, fU, 4);
9560  ++fNfcn;
9561 
9562  if(yrho < fSIMPy[jl-1] && yrho < ystst)
9563  goto L65;
9564 
9565  if(ystst < fSIMPy[jl-1])
9566  goto L67;
9567 
9568  if(yrho > fSIMPy[jl-1])
9569  goto L66;
9570 
9571 //*-*- accept minimum point of parabola, PRHO
9572 L65:
9573  mnrazz(yrho, fPrho, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9574  goto L68;
9575 L66:
9576 
9577  if(ystst < fSIMPy[jl-1])
9578  goto L67;
9579 
9580  mnrazz(ystar, fPstar, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9581  goto L68;
9582 L67:
9583  mnrazz(ystst, fPstst, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9584 L68:
9585  ++ncycl;
9586 
9587  if(fISW[4] < 2)
9588  goto L50;
9589 
9590  if(fISW[4] >= 3 || ncycl % 10 == 0) {
9591  mnprin(5, fAmin);
9592  }
9593 
9594  goto L50;
9595 //*-*- point * is not as good as jl
9596 L70:
9597 
9598  if(ystar >= fSIMPy[jh-1])
9599  goto L73;
9600 
9601  jhold = jh;
9602  mnrazz(ystar, fPstar, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9603 
9604  if(jhold != jh)
9605  goto L50;
9606 
9607 //*-*- calculate new point **
9608 L73:
9609 
9610  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9611  fPstst[i-1] = beta*fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] + (1 - beta)*fPbar[i-1];
9612  }
9613 
9614  mninex(fPstst);
9615  Eval(nparx, fGin, ystst, fU, 4);
9616  ++fNfcn;
9617 
9618  if(ystst > fSIMPy[jh-1])
9619  goto L1;
9620 
9621 //*-*- point ** is better than jh
9622  if(ystst < fAmin)
9623  goto L67;
9624 
9625  mnrazz(ystst, fPstst, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9626  goto L50;
9627 //*-*- . . . . . . end main loop
9628 L76:
9629 
9630  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
9631  printf(" SIMPLEX MINIMIZATION HAS CONVERGED.\n");
9632  }
9633 
9634  fISW[3] = 1;
9635  goto L80;
9636 L78:
9637 
9638  if(fISW[4] >= 0) {
9639  printf(" SIMPLEX TERMINATES WITHOUT CONVERGENCE.\n");
9640  }
9641 
9642  fCstatu = "CALL LIMIT";
9643  fISW[3] = -1;
9644  fISW[0] = 1;
9645 L80:
9646 
9647  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
9648  pb = 0;
9649 
9650  for(j = 1; j <= nparp1; ++j) {
9651  pb += wg*fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9652  }
9653 
9654  fPbar[i-1] = pb - wg*fP[i + jh*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
9655  }
9656 
9657  mninex(fPbar);
9658  Eval(nparx, fGin, ypbar, fU, 4);
9659  ++fNfcn;
9660 
9661  if(ypbar < fAmin)
9662  mnrazz(ypbar, fPbar, fSIMPy, jh, jl);
9663 
9664  mninex(fX);
9665 
9666  if(fNfcnmx + npfn - fNfcn < fNpar*3)
9667  goto L90;
9668 
9669  if(fEDM > fEpsi*2)
9670  goto L1;
9671 
9672 L90:
9673 
9674  if(fISW[4] >= 0)
9675  mnprin(5, fAmin);
9676 } /* mnsimp_ */
9677 
9678 //______________________________________________________________________________
9679 void TMinuit::mnstat(double& fmin, double& fedm, double& errdef, int& npari, int& nparx, int& istat) {
9680 //*-*-*-*-*Returns concerning the current status of the minimization*-*-*-*-*
9681 //*-* =========================================================
9682 //*-* User-called
9683 //*-* Namely, it returns:
9684 //*-* FMIN: the best function value found so far
9685 //*-* FEDM: the estimated vertical distance remaining to minimum
9686 //*-* ERRDEF: the value of UP defining parameter uncertainties
9687 //*-* NPARI: the number of currently variable parameters
9688 //*-* NPARX: the highest (external) parameter number defined by user
9689 //*-* ISTAT: a status integer indicating how good is the covariance
9690 //*-* matrix: 0= not calculated at all
9691 //*-* 1= approximation only, not accurate
9692 //*-* 2= full matrix, but forced positive-definite
9693 //*-* 3= full accurate covariance matrix
9694 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9695 
9696  fmin = fAmin;
9697  fedm = fEDM;
9698  errdef = fUp;
9699  npari = fNpar;
9700  nparx = fNu;
9701  istat = fISW[1];
9702 
9703  if(fEDM == fBigedm)
9704  fedm = fUp;
9705 
9706  if(fAmin == fUndefi) {
9707  fmin = 0;
9708  fedm = fUp;
9709  istat = 0;
9710  }
9711 } /* mnstat_ */
9712 
9713 //______________________________________________________________________________
9714 void TMinuit::mntiny(double epsp1, double& epsbak) {
9715 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*To find the machine precision*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9716 //*-* =============================
9717 //*-* Compares its argument with the value 1.0, and returns
9718 //*-* the value .TRUE. if they are equal. To find EPSMAC
9719 //*-* safely by foiling the Fortran optimizer
9720 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9721 
9722  epsbak = epsp1 - 1;
9723 } /* mntiny_ */
9724 
9725 //______________________________________________________________________________
9726 bool TMinuit::mnunpt(string& cfname) {
9727 //*-*-*-*-*-*Returns .TRUE. if CFNAME contains unprintable characters*-*-*-*
9728 //*-* ========================================================
9729 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9730 
9731  int i, l, ic;
9732  bool ret_val;
9733  static string cpt = " ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890./;:[]$%*_!@#&+()";
9734 
9735  ret_val = false;
9736  l = strlen(cfname.c_str());
9737 
9738  for(i = 1; i <= l; ++i) {
9739  for(ic = 1; ic <= 80; ++ic) {
9740  if(cfname[i-1] == cpt[ic-1])
9741  goto L100;
9742  }
9743 
9744  return true;
9745 L100:
9746  ;
9747  }
9748 
9749  return ret_val;
9750 } /* mnunpt_ */
9751 
9752 //______________________________________________________________________________
9753 void TMinuit::mnvert(double* a, int l, int, int n, int& ifail) {
9754 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Inverts a symmetric matrix*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9755 //*-* ==========================
9756 //*-* inverts a symmetric matrix. matrix is first scaled to
9757 //*-* have all ones on the diagonal (equivalent to change of units)
9758 //*-* but no pivoting is done since matrix is positive-definite.
9759 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9760 
9761  /* System generated locals */
9762  int a_offset;
9763 
9764  /* Local variables */
9765  double si;
9766  int i, j, k, kp1, km1;
9767 
9768  /* Parameter adjustments */
9769  a_offset = l + 1;
9770  a -= a_offset;
9771 
9772  /* Function Body */
9773  ifail = 0;
9774 
9775  if(n < 1)
9776  goto L100;
9777 
9778  if(n > fMaxint)
9779  goto L100;
9780 
9781 //*-*- scale matrix by sqrt of diag elements
9782  for(i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
9783  si = a[i + i*l];
9784 
9785  if(si <= 0)
9786  goto L100;
9787 
9788  fVERTs[i-1] = 1 / sqrt(si);
9789  }
9790 
9791  for(i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
9792  for(j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
9793  a[i + j*l] = a[i + j*l]*fVERTs[i-1]*fVERTs[j-1];
9794  }
9795  }
9796 
9797 //*-*- . . . start main loop . . . .
9798  for(i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
9799  k = i;
9800 
9801 //*-*- preparation for elimination step1
9802  if(a[k + k*l] != 0)
9803  fVERTq[k-1] = 1 / a[k + k*l];
9804  else
9805  goto L100;
9806 
9807  fVERTpp[k-1] = 1;
9808  a[k + k*l] = 0;
9809  kp1 = k + 1;
9810  km1 = k - 1;
9811 
9812  if(km1 < 0)
9813  goto L100;
9814  else if(km1 == 0)
9815  goto L50;
9816  else
9817  goto L40;
9818 
9819 L40:
9820 
9821  for(j = 1; j <= km1; ++j) {
9822  fVERTpp[j-1] = a[j + k*l];
9823  fVERTq[j-1] = a[j + k*l]*fVERTq[k-1];
9824  a[j + k*l] = 0;
9825  }
9826 
9827 L50:
9828 
9829  if(k - n < 0)
9830  goto L51;
9831  else if(k - n == 0)
9832  goto L60;
9833  else
9834  goto L100;
9835 
9836 L51:
9837 
9838  for(j = kp1; j <= n; ++j) {
9839  fVERTpp[j-1] = a[k + j*l];
9840  fVERTq[j-1] = -a[k + j*l]*fVERTq[k-1];
9841  a[k + j*l] = 0;
9842  }
9843 
9844 //*-*- elimination proper
9845 L60:
9846 
9847  for(j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
9848  for(k = j; k <= n; ++k) {
9849  a[j + k*l] += fVERTpp[j-1]*fVERTq[k-1];
9850  }
9851  }
9852  }
9853 
9854 //*-*- elements of left diagonal and unscaling
9855  for(j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
9856  for(k = 1; k <= j; ++k) {
9857  a[k + j*l] = a[k + j*l]*fVERTs[k-1]*fVERTs[j-1];
9858  a[j + k*l] = a[k + j*l];
9859  }
9860  }
9861 
9862  return;
9863 //*-*- failure return
9864 L100:
9865  ifail = 1;
9866 } /* mnvert_ */
9867 
9868 //______________________________________________________________________________
9869 void TMinuit::mnwarn(const char* copt1, const char* corg1, const char* cmes1) {
9870 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Prints Warning messages*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9871 //*-* =======================
9872 //*-* If COPT='W', CMES is a WARning message from CORG.
9873 //*-* If COPT='D', CMES is a DEBug message from CORG.
9874 //*-* If SET WARnings is in effect (the default), this routine
9875 //*-* prints the warning message CMES coming from CORG.
9876 //*-* If SET NOWarnings is in effect, the warning message is
9877 //*-* stored in a circular buffer of length kMAXMES.
9878 //*-* If called with CORG=CMES='SHO', it prints the messages in
9879 //*-* the circular buffer, FIFO, and empties the buffer.
9880 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9881 
9882  string copt = copt1;
9883  string corg = corg1;
9884  string cmes = cmes1;
9885 
9886  const int kMAXMES = 10;
9887  int ityp, i, ic, nm;
9888  string englsh, ctyp;
9889 
9890  if(corg.substr(0, 3) != "SHO" || cmes.substr(0, 3) != "SHO") {
9891 
9892 //*-*- Either print warning or put in buffer
9893  if(copt == "W") {
9894  ityp = 1;
9895 
9896  if(fLwarn) {
9897  printf(" MINUIT WARNING IN %s\n", corg.c_str());
9898  printf(" ============== %s\n", cmes.c_str());
9899  return;
9900  }
9901  } else {
9902  ityp = 2;
9903 
9904  if(fLrepor) {
9905  printf(" MINUIT DEBUG FOR %s\n", corg.c_str());
9906  printf(" =============== %s \n", cmes.c_str());
9907  return;
9908  }
9909  }
9910 
9911 //*-*- if appropriate flag is off, fill circular buffer
9912  if(fNwrmes[ityp-1] == 0)
9913  fIcirc[ityp-1] = 0;
9914 
9915  ++fNwrmes[ityp-1];
9916  ++fIcirc[ityp-1];
9917 
9918  if(fIcirc[ityp-1] > 10)
9919  fIcirc[ityp-1] = 1;
9920 
9921  ic = fIcirc[ityp-1];
9922  fOrigin[ic] = corg;
9923  fWarmes[ic] = cmes;
9924  fNfcwar[ic] = fNfcn;
9925  return;
9926  }
9927 
9928 //*-*- 'SHO WARnings', ask if any suppressed mess in buffer
9929  if(copt == "W") {
9930  ityp = 1;
9931  ctyp = "WARNING";
9932  } else {
9933  ityp = 2;
9934  ctyp = "*DEBUG*";
9935  }
9936 
9937  if(fNwrmes[ityp-1] > 0) {
9938  englsh = " WAS SUPPRESSED. ";
9939 
9940  if(fNwrmes[ityp-1] > 1)
9941  englsh = "S WERE SUPPRESSED.";
9942 
9943  printf(" %5d MINUIT %s MESSAGE%s\n", fNwrmes[ityp-1]
9944  , ctyp.c_str(), englsh.c_str());
9945  nm = fNwrmes[ityp-1];
9946  ic = 0;
9947 
9948  if(nm > kMAXMES) {
9949  printf(" ONLY THE MOST RECENT 10 WILL BE LISTED BELOW.\n");
9950  nm = kMAXMES;
9951  ic = fIcirc[ityp-1];
9952  }
9953 
9954  printf(" CALLS ORIGIN MESSAGE\n");
9955 
9956  for(i = 1; i <= nm; ++i) {
9957  ++ic;
9958 
9959  if(ic > kMAXMES)
9960  ic = 1;
9961 
9962  printf(" %6d %s %s\n", fNfcwar[ic], fOrigin[ic].c_str(), fWarmes[ic].c_str());
9963  }
9964 
9965  fNwrmes[ityp-1] = 0;
9966  printf(" \n");
9967  }
9968 } /* mnwarn_ */
9969 
9970 //______________________________________________________________________________
9971 void TMinuit::mnwerr() {
9972 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*Calculates the WERR, external parameter errors*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9973 //*-* ==============================================
9974 //*-* and the global correlation coefficients, to be called
9975 //*-* whenever a new covariance matrix is available.
9976 //*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
9977 
9978  double denom, ba, al, dx, du1, du2;
9979  int ndex, ierr, i, j, k, l, ndiag, k1, iin;
9980 
9981 //*-*- calculate external error if v exists
9982  if(fISW[1] >= 1) {
9983  for(l = 1; l <= fNpar; ++l) {
9984  ndex = l*(l + 1) / 2;
9985  dx = sqrt(fabs(fVhmat[ndex-1]*fUp));
9986  i = fNexofi[l-1];
9987 
9988  if(fNvarl[i-1] > 1) {
9989  al = fAlim[i-1];
9990  ba = fBlim[i-1] - al;
9991  du1 = al + 0.5*(sin(fX[l-1] + dx) + 1)*ba - fU[i-1];
9992  du2 = al + 0.5*(sin(fX[l-1] - dx) + 1)*ba - fU[i-1];
9993 
9994  if(dx > 1)
9995  du1 = ba;
9996 
9997  dx = 0.5*(fabs(du1) + fabs(du2));
9998  }
9999 
10000  fWerr[l-1] = dx;
10001  }
10002  }
10003 
10004 //*-*- global correlation coefficients
10005  if(fISW[1] >= 1) {
10006  for(i = 1; i <= fNpar; ++i) {
10007  fGlobcc[i-1] = 0;
10008  k1 = i*(i-1) / 2;
10009 
10010  for(j = 1; j <= i; ++j) {
10011  k = k1 + j;
10012  fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] = fVhmat[k-1];
10013  fP[j + i*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1] = fP[i + j*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1];
10014  }
10015  }
10016 
10017  mnvert(fP, fMaxint, fMaxint, fNpar, ierr);
10018 
10019  if(ierr == 0) {
10020  for(iin = 1; iin <= fNpar; ++iin) {
10021  ndiag = iin*(iin + 1) / 2;
10022  denom = fP[iin + iin*fMaxpar - fMaxpar-1]*fVhmat[ndiag-1];
10023 
10024  if(denom <= 1 && denom >= 0)
10025  fGlobcc[iin-1] = 0;
10026  else
10027  fGlobcc[iin-1] = sqrt(1 - 1 / denom);
10028  }
10029  }
10030  }
10031 } /* mnwerr_ */
TMinuit::fBigedm
double fBigedm
Definition: TMinuit.h:57
